posts.title: EOJ Monthly 2019.2 (based on February Selection)
posts.text:
EOJ Monthly 2019.2 (based on February Selection) A. 回收卫星题目大意交互题。有一个球心为$~(x,~y,~z)~$半径为$~r~$的球，且原点$~(0,~0,~0)~$保证在球内部或边界上。每次可以询问一个点是否在球的内部或边界上，需要在至多$~200~$次询问下确定球心坐标。数据范围$~{\mid x\mid}\leq10^9,~{\mid y\mid}\leq10^9,~{\mid z\mid}\leq10^9,~1\leq r\leq10^9~$。 题解通过二分可以确定$~x_1=\max\lbrace x_0\mid(x-x_0)^2+y^2+z^2\leq r^2brace~$和$~x_2=\min\lbrace x_0\mid(x-x_0)^2+y^2+z^2\leq r^2brace~$。注意到绝对值最大为$~2	imes10^9~$，二分上界必须大于该数，且会爆$~	ext{int}~$。考虑关于$~x_0~$的一元二次方程 (x-x_0)^2+y^2+z^2=r^2解为 x_0=x\pm\sqrt{r^2-y^2-z^2}于是有 x_1=x+\left\lfloor\sqrt{r^2-y^2-z^2}ightfloor \ x_2=x-\left\lfloor\sqrt{r^2-y^2-z^2}ightfloor \ x={ rac{x_1+x_2}{2}}同理可解出$~y~$与$~z~$。次数最多$~6	imes32=192~$次。 代码12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;const int INF = 2000000001;inline int query(const int& x, const int& y, const int& z) { cout << 0 << ' ' << x << ' ' << y << ' ' << z << endl; int ret; cin >> ret; return ret;}int main() { long long left, right, x1, x2, y1, y2, z1, z2; { left = 0, right = INF; while (right - left != 1) { int mid = left + right >> 1; if (query(mid, 0, 0)) left = mid; else right = mid; } x1 = left; } { left = 0, right = INF; while (right - left != 1) { int mid = left + right >> 1; if (query(-mid, 0, 0)) left = mid; else right = mid; } x2 = -left; } { left = 0, right = INF; while (right - left != 1) { int mid = left + right >> 1; if (query(0, mid, 0)) left = mid; else right = mid; } y1 = left; } { left = 0, right = INF; while (right - left != 1) { int mid = left + right >> 1; if (query(0, -mid, 0)) left = mid; else right = mid; } y2 = -left; } { left = 0, right = INF; while (right - left != 1) { int mid = left + right >> 1; if (query(0, 0, mid)) left = mid; else right = mid; } z1 = left; } { left = 0, right = INF; while (right - left != 1) { int mid = left + right >> 1; if (query(0, 0, -mid)) left = mid; else right = mid; } z2 = -left; } cout << 1 << ' ' << (x1 + x2 >> 1) << ' ' << (y1 + y2 >> 1) << ' ' << (z1 + z2 >> 1) << endl;} B. 解题题目大意给定一个$~n~$位大整数，询问$~q~$次，每次给定一个正整数$~m~$。选取大整数十进制表示下连续的一段保留，其余全变成$~0~$，找出最小的如此生成的正整数满足是$~m~$的倍数，或者不存在。数据范围$~1\leq n\leq10^6,~1\leq q\leq500,~\sum m\leq5	imes10^7~$。 题解记$~a_i~$为大整数后$~i~$位模$~m~$的余数，注意需要添加$~a_0=0~$。取区间$~[l,r]~$生成的数字是$~m~$的倍数，等价于$~a_{n+1-l}=a_{n-r}~$。只要将$~i~$从小到大计算$~a_i~$，对于最小的$~j~$，存在$~i< j~$满足$~a_i=a_j~$，则答案$~[l,r]=[n+1-j,n-i]~$。由抽屉原理，至多计算$~m+1~$次就一定能得出答案。总时间复杂度为$~O(\sum m)~$。 代码123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int main() { ios::sync_with_stdio(false); cin.tie(nullptr); string num; cin >> num; const int n = num.size(); vector<int> dig(n); for (int i = 0; i != n; ++i) dig[i] = num[i] - '0'; int q; cin >> q; while (q--) { int m; cin >> m; vector<int> pos(m, 0); pos[0] = n; bool flag = true; int base = 1, now = 0; for (int i = n - 1; ~i; --i) { now = (now + base * dig[i]) % m; if (pos[now]) { cout << i + 1 << ' ' << pos[now] << '
'; flag = false; break; } pos[now] = i; base = base * 10 % m; } if (flag) cout << -1 << '
'; }} C. 魔板题目大意有一个$~n	imes m~$个格点的网格图，第$~i~$行第$~j~$列的坐标为$~(i,j)~$。每个点有个数字，有序状态下$~(i,j)~$的数字为$~(i-1)	imes m+j~$。有两种置换方式：选择$~(x< n,~y< m)~$，将$~(x,y),(x+1,y),(x,y+1)~$上的数字顺时针交换；选择$~(x< n,~y< m)~$，将$~(x,y),(x+1,y),(x+1,y+1),(x,y+1)~$上的数字顺时针交换。现给定一个打乱的状态，输出任意一种使其有序的操作方式，且次数不能超过$~3\cdot10^6~$。数据范围$~2\leq n,m\leq100~$。 题解构造大模拟。注意到先进行$~1~$次操作$~2~$再进行$~2~$次操作$~1~$，等价于只交换$~(x+1,y)~$和$~(x+1,y+1)~$。先进行$~2~$次操作$~1~$再进行$~1~$次操作$~2~$，等价于只交换$~(x,y+1)~$和$~(x+1,y+1)~$。那么暴力模拟即可，上限$~3\cdot10^6~$其实很宽松。 题解123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;typedef pair<int, int> pii;#define ff first#define ss second#define mp make_pairpii pos[10001];int mat[101][101], m, n, res_size;pair<int, pii> res[1 << 22];inline void work1(int x, int y) { int a = mat[x][y], b = mat[x + 1][y], c = mat[x][y + 1]; pos[mat[x + 1][y] = a] = mp(x + 1, y); pos[mat[x][y + 1] = b] = mp(x, y + 1); pos[mat[x][y] = c] = mp(x, y); res[res_size++] = mp(1, mp(x, y));}inline void work2(int x, int y) { int a = mat[x][y], b = mat[x + 1][y], c = mat[x + 1][y + 1], d = mat[x][y + 1]; pos[mat[x + 1][y] = a] = mp(x + 1, y); pos[mat[x + 1][y + 1] = b] = mp(x + 1, y + 1); pos[mat[x][y + 1] = c] = mp(x, y + 1); pos[mat[x][y] = d] = mp(x, y); res[res_size++] = mp(2, mp(x, y));}inline void swap_up(int x, int y) { work2(x, y); work1(x, y); work1(x, y);}inline void swap_right(int x, int y) { work1(x, y); work1(x, y); work2(x, y);}int main() { cin >> n >> m; for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) for (int j = 1; j <= m; ++j) { cin >> mat[i][j]; pos[mat[i][j]] = mp(i, j); } for (int i = 1, k = 1; i <= n; ++i) for (int j = 1; j <= m; ++j, ++k) { while (pos[k].ss < j) { if (pos[k].ff != n) { work1(pos[k].ff, pos[k].ss); work1(pos[k].ff - 1, pos[k].ss); } else { swap_up(pos[k].ff - 1, pos[k].ss); } } while (pos[k].ss > j) { if (pos[k].ff != n) { work1(pos[k].ff, pos[k].ss - 1); } else { swap_up(pos[k].ff - 1, pos[k].ss - 1); } } while (pos[k].ff > i + 1) { if (j != 1) { work2(pos[k].ff - 1, pos[k].ss - 1); } else { work1(pos[k].ff - 1, pos[k].ss); work1(pos[k].ff, pos[k].ss - 1); } } if (pos[k].ff != i) { if (j != m) { work1(pos[k].ff - 1, pos[k].ss); work1(pos[k].ff, pos[k].ss - 1); } else { swap_right(pos[k].ff - 1, pos[k].ss - 1); } } } cout << res_size << '
'; for (int i = 0; i != res_size; ++i) cout << res[i].ff << ' ' << res[i].ss.ff << ' ' << res[i].ss.ss << '
';} D. 进制转换题目大意问$~[l,r]~$中有多少个数的$~k~$进制表示恰好有$~m~$个末尾$~0~$。数据范围$1\leq T\leq10^5,~1\leq l\leq r\leq10^18,~2\leq k,m\leq100$。 题解水题。预处理所有的$~k^m~$，然后将$~k^m~$的倍数的数量减去$~k^{m+1}~$的数量即可。总时间复杂度为$~O(km+T)~$，注意细节。 代码1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;const long long INF = 0x3f3f3f3f3f3f3f3f;long long pown[101][102];inline long long calc(const long long& n, const int& k, const int& m) { return (~pown[k][m] ? n / pown[k][m] : 0) - (~pown[k][m + 1] ? n / pown[k][m + 1] : 0);}int main() { for (int i = 2; i <= 100; ++i) { pown[i][0] = 1; for (int j = 1; j <= 101; ++j) { if (pown[i][j - 1] < INF / i && ~pown[i][j - 1]) pown[i][j] = pown[i][j - 1] * i; else pown[i][j] = -1; } } int t; cin >> t; while (t--) { long long l, r; int k, m; cin >> l >> r >> k >> m; cout << calc(r, k, m) - calc(l - 1, k, m) << endl; }} E. 中位数题目大意给定一个带点权有重边的有向无环图$~	ext{DAG}~$，问点$~1~$到点$~n~$所有路径的最大中位数。路径的中位数定义为升序后角标为$~\lfloor rac{x}{2}floor+1~$的权值。 题解二分套$~	ext{DAG}~$上差分$~	ext{DP}~$。二分答案，然后对于权值大于等于当前值的点标记为$~1~$反之为$~-1~$。从点$~1~$开始跑$~	ext{DP}~$，如果点$~n~$的结果小于$~0~$，则当前值过大。可以先对$~	ext{DAG}~$先拓扑排序，这样$~	ext{DP}~$过程不需要用递归实现，常数小。总时间复杂度为$~O(n\log A)~$。 代码123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;const int maxn = 1 << 20;int deg[maxn], a[maxn], cal[maxn];vector<int> adj[maxn], topo;void dfs(int u = 1) { for (auto v : adj[u]) if (!deg[v]++) dfs(v); }void topo_sort() { topo.push_back(1); for (int i = 0; i != (int)topo.size(); ++i) for (auto j : adj[topo[i]]) if (!--deg[j]) topo.push_back(j);}bool check(const int& x, const int& end) { memset(cal, 0xc0, sizeof (cal)); cal[1] = 0; for (auto u : topo) { a[u] < x ? --cal[u] : ++cal[u]; for (auto v : adj[u]) cal[v] = max(cal[v], cal[u]); } return cal[end] >= 0;}int main() { int n, m; cin >> n >> m; for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) cin >> a[i]; while (m--) { int u, v; cin >> u >> v; adj[u].push_back(v); } dfs(); if (!deg[n]) return cout << -1 << endl, 0; topo_sort(); int left = 0, right = 0x3f3f3f3f; while (right - left != 1) { int mid = (left + right) >> 1; if (check(mid, n)) left = mid; else right = mid; } cout << left << endl;} F. 方差题目大意给定$~n~$个数，问$~m~$个数的最小方差$~\sigma^2~$是多少，输出$~\sigma^2m^2~$。数据范围$~1\leq m\leq n\leq10^6,~1\leq x\leq10^3~$。 题解先排序，注意到数据范围，桶排（基数排序）的时间复杂度为$~O(n+x)~$。注意到方差计算公式  egin{aligned} \sigma^2 &= rac{1}{m}\sum(a- ar{a})^2 \ &= rac{1}{m}\sum a^2- ar{a}^2 \end{aligned}于是答案计算公式为 \max\{m\sum_{i=l}^{r}a_i^2-(\sum_{i=l}^{r}a_i)^2\}滑窗即可。总时间复杂度为$~O(n+x)~$。 代码1234567891011121314151617181920#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;long long a[1 << 20];int main() { int n, m; cin >> n >> m; for (int i = 0; i ^ n; ++i) cin >> a[i]; sort(a, a + n); long long cal1 = 0, cal2 = 0; for (int i = 0; i ^ m; ++i) cal1 += a[i] * a[i], cal2 += a[i]; long long res = cal1 * m - cal2 * cal2; for (int i = m; i ^ n; ++i) { cal1 += a[i] * a[i] - a[i - m] * a[i - m]; cal2 += a[i] - a[i - m]; res = min(res, cal1 * m - cal2 * cal2); } cout << res << endl;}

posts.title: Educational Codeforces Round 60 (Rated for Div. 2)
posts.text: Educational Codeforces Round 60 (Rated for Div. 2) A. Best Subsegment题目大意水题。 题解水题。 代码12345678910111213141516#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int main() { int n; cin >> n; vector<int> a(n); for (auto& in : a) cin >> in; int x = * max_element(a.begin(), a.end()); int res = 0, cnt = 0; for (auto aa : a) { if (aa ^ x) res = max(res, cnt), cnt = 0; else ++cnt; } cout << max(res, cnt) << endl;} B. Emotes题目大意水题。 题解水题。 代码12345678910111213141516#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int main() { int n, m, k; cin >> n >> m >> k; vector<long long> a(n); long long max1 = 0, max2 = 0; while (n--) { long long a; cin >> a; if (a > max2) max2 = a; if (max1 < max2) swap(max1, max2); } cout << m / (k + 1) * (max1 * k + max2) + m % (k + 1) * max1 << endl;} C. Magic Ship题目大意要让一艘船从$~(x_1,~y_1)~$走到$~(x_2,~y_2)~$，每天可以选择上下左右或者不走。但是还有给定的周期为$~n~$的风速影响，每天船的最终移动为当前的风速与船速的选择之和。问到达目的地的最短时间或达不到。 题解将船速和风速分开考虑。那么第$~k~$天能到达目的地，当且仅当$~{\mid x_2-x_3\mid+\mid y_2-y_3\mid}\leq k~$。其中$~(x_3,~y_3)~$为如果这$~k~$天船本身静止依靠风速所到达的地点。那么就可以二分天数得出答案了。总时间复杂度为$~O(n+\log\max)~$。 代码、123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;typedef pair<long long, long long> pll;#define mp make_pair#define ff first#define ss secondinline pll operator + (const pll& x, const pll& y) {return mp(x.ff + y.ff, x.ss + y.ss);}inline pll operator - (const pll& x, const pll& y) {return mp(x.ff - y.ff, x.ss - y.ss);}inline pll operator * (const pll& x, const long long& y) {return mp(x.ff * y, x.ss * y);}const long long INF = 0x3f3f3f3f3f3f3f3f;const int maxn = 1e5 + 5;int n;pll wind[maxn], p1, p2;inline bool check(const long long& step) { pll tmp = wind[n] * (step / n) + wind[step % n] - p2; return abs(tmp.ff) + abs(tmp.ss) <= step;}int main() { cin >> p1.ff >> p1.ss >> p2.ff >> p2.ss >> n; p2 = p2 - p1; map<char, pll> cal; cal['U'] = mp(0LL, 1LL); cal['D'] = mp(0LL, -1LL); cal['L'] = mp(-1LL, 0LL); cal['R'] = mp(1LL, 0LL); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { char ch; cin >> ch; wind[i] = wind[i - 1] + cal[ch]; } long long left = 0, right = INF; while (right - left ^ 1) { long long mid = left + right >> 1; if (check(mid)) right = mid; else left = mid; } cout << (right ^ INF ? right : -1) << endl;} D. Magic Gems题目大意观察样例可知题目等价于询问有多少长度为$~N~$的$~01~$序列使得每段连续的$~0~$的长度都是$~M~$的倍数。数据范围$~1\leq N\leq10^{18},~2\leq M\leq100~$。 题解显然有答案序列的转移式$~res_N=res_{N-1}+res_{N-M}~$。那么转化为矩阵快速幂问题可以在$~O(M^3\log N)~$的时间复杂内解决。当然也存在$~O(M^2\log N)~$与$~O(M\log M\log N)~$的算法。 代码（$~O(M^3\log N)~$）1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;const int mod = 1e9 + 7;inline int sub(const int& a, const int& b) {return a < b ? a - b + mod : a - b;}inline int add(const int& a, const int& b) {return sub(a, mod - b);}inline int mul(const int& a, const int& b) {return 1LL * a * b % mod;}int base[100][100], mat[100][100], tmp[100][100], m;inline void mul(int C[][100], int A[][100], int B[][100]) { for (int i = 0; i ^ m; ++i) for (int j = 0; j ^ m; ++j) { C[i][j] = 0; for (int k = 0; k ^ m; ++k) C[i][j] = add(C[i][j], mul(A[i][k], B[k][j])); }}int main() { long long n; cin >> n >> m; base[0][0] = base[0][m - 1] = mat[0][0] = 1; for (int i = 1; i ^ m; ++i) base[i][i - 1] = mat[i][i] = 1; while (n) { if (n & 1) { mul(tmp, mat, base); memcpy(mat, tmp, sizeof (tmp)); } mul(tmp, base, base); memcpy(base, tmp, sizeof (tmp)); n >>= 1; } cout << mat[0][0] << endl;} 代码（$~O(M^2\log N)~$）1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;typedef vector<int> vi;const int mod = 1e9 + 7;inline int sub(const int& a, const int& b) {return a < b ? a - b + mod : a - b;}inline int add(const int& a, const int& b) {return sub(a, mod - b);}inline int mul(const int& a, const int& b) {return 1LL * a * b % mod;}vi linear_calc(vi& c, long long n) { int size = c.size(); if (size == 1) { int ret = 1; for (int a = c.front(); n; n >>= 1) { if (n & 1) ret = mul(ret, a); a = mul(a, a); } return vi(1, ret); } vector<vi> base(size << 1, vi(size, 0)), pow(64, vi(size, 0)); base[0][0] = 1; for (int i = 1; i ^ size << 1; ++i) for (int j = 0; j ^ size; ++j) base[i][j] = add(mul(base[i - 1].back(), c[j]), j ? base[i - 1][j - 1] : 0); if (n < (size << 1)) return base[n]; pow[0][1] = 1; for (int i = 1; i ^ 64; ++i) { vi tmp(size << 1, 0); for (int j = 0; j ^ size; ++j) for (int k = 0; k ^ size; ++k) tmp[j + k] = add(tmp[j + k], mul(pow[i - 1][j], pow[i - 1][k])); for (int j = 0; j ^ size << 1; ++j) for (int k = 0; k ^ size; ++k) pow[i][k] = add(pow[i][k], mul(tmp[j], base[j][k])); } int index = 62; while ((1LL << index) > n) --index; vi ret = pow[index]; n ^= 1LL << index; while (n) { while ((1LL << index) > n) --index; n ^= 1LL << index; vi tmp(size << 1, 0); for (int i = 0; i ^ size; ++i) for (int j = 0; j ^ size; ++j) tmp[i + j] = add(tmp[i + j], mul(ret[i], pow[index][j])); fill(ret.begin(), ret.end(), 0); for (int i = 0; i ^ size << 1; ++i) for (int j = 0; j ^ size; ++j) ret[j] = add(ret[j], mul(tmp[i], base[i][j])); } return ret;}int main() { long long n; int m; cin >> n >> m; vi base(m, 0); base.front() = base.back() = 1; base = linear_calc(base, n); int res = 0; for (auto x : base) res = add(res, x); cout << res << endl;} E. Decypher the String题目大意交互题。现有一个确定但不给出的字符串重排置换，然后给定一个某字符串经过该置换得到的新串。你可以询问任意一个同样长度的字符串，然后返回经过该置换得到的新串。要求在$~3~$次询问以内找出给定串的原串。所有字符串均为小写字母串。数据范围$~1\leq n\leq10^4~$。 题解字符集大小为$~26~$。那么考虑这样的一个询问：字符串开头从$~\text{a}~$开始，每隔$~26^k~$个字符切换到下一个字母。那么就可以得到逆置换下，每个位置所指向的新位置模$~26^{k+1}~$的余数$~x~$再除以$~26^k~$的下取整$~\lfloor\frac{x}{26^k}\rfloor~$的值是多少。所以当$~n\leq10^4\leq26^3~$时，做$~3~$次询问就能确定置换。 代码123456789101112131415161718192021222324#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int main() { string str, ask[3], ans[3], res(26 * 26 * 26, '#'); for (char i = 'a'; i <= 'z'; ++i) for (char j = 'a'; j <= 'z'; ++j) for (char k = 'a'; k <= 'z'; ++k) { ask[0].append(1, i); ask[1].append(1, j); ask[2].append(1, k); } cin >> str; int n = str.size(); str.append(26 * 26 * 26 - n, '#'); for (int i = 0; i ^ 3; ++i) { cout << "? " << ask[i].substr(0, n) << endl; cin >> ans[i]; ans[i].append(ask[i], n, 26 * 26 * 26 - n); } for (int i = 0; i ^ 26 * 26 * 26; ++i) res[26 * 26 * (ans[0][i] - 'a') + 26 * (ans[1][i] - 'a') + (ans[2][i] - 'a')] = str[i]; cout << "! " << res.substr(0, n) << endl;} F. Crisp String题目大意给定一个长度为$~n~$由前$~p~$个小写字母组成的字符串，以及一个$~p\times p~$的$~01~$对称矩阵。定义一个字符串是$~\text{crisp}~$的，当且仅当字符串中所有相邻的字符对在矩阵中对应的值是$~1~$，保证给定字符串是$~\text{crisp}~$的。每一步操作可以选择一个还有的字母，将字符串中所有该字母删除。在保证每一步操作后字符串依然是$~\text{crisp}~$的条件下，问字符串最短长度。数据范围$~1\leq n\leq10^5,~1\leq p\leq17~$。 题解状压$~\text{DP}~$。按位储存当前状态下还有那些字母存在，那么只需要考虑每个状态的合法性即可。对于每对字母$~(i,~j)~$，可以线性对字符串扫描一遍，算出恰好使得$~i~$与$~j~$相邻所需要删除的状态。然后再对所有状态$~\text{DP}~$，得出在每个状态下$~i~$与$~j~$是否相邻。总时间复杂度为$~O(np^2+p^32^p)~$。代码所写的常数比较大，也存在$~O(np+p^32^p)~$的做法。 代码123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;const int maxn = 1e5 + 5;int n, p, A[17][17], cnt[17], cal[1 << 17], res = maxn, a[maxn];bool check[1 << 17], adj[17][17][1 << 17], vis[1 << 17];void dfs(int mask) { if (vis[mask]) return; vis[mask] = true; for (int i = 0; i != p; ++i) for (int j = 0; j != p; ++j) if (mask & 1 << i && mask & 1 << j && !A[i][j] && adj[i][j][((1 << p) - 1) ^ mask]) return; res = min(res, cal[mask]); for (int i = 0; i != p; ++i) if (mask & 1 << i) dfs(mask ^ 1 << i);}int main() { ios::sync_with_stdio(false); cin.tie(nullptr); string str; cin >> n >> p >> str; for (int i = 0; i != p; ++i) for (int j = 0; j != p; ++j) cin >> A[i][j]; for (int i = 0; i != n; ++i) ++cnt[a[i] = str[i] - 'a']; for (int i = 1; i != (1 << p); ++i) cal[i] = cal[i ^ (i & -i)] + cnt[__builtin_ctz(i)]; for (int i = 0; i != p; ++i) for (int j = 0; j != p; ++j) { bool check = false; for (int k = 0, l; k != n; ++k) { if (a[k] == j) { if (check) adj[i][j][l] = adj[j][i][l] = true; check = false; } if (a[k] == i) { check = true; l = 0; } if (a[k] != i && a[k] != j) l |= 1 << a[k]; } } for (int i = 0; i != p; ++i) for (int j = 0; j != p; ++j) for (int k = 1; k != (1 << p); ++k) for (int l = 0; l != p; ++l) if (k & 1 << l) adj[i][j][k] |= adj[i][j][k ^ 1 << l]; dfs((1 << p) - 1); cout << res << endl;} G. Recursive Queries题目大意给定一个全排列$~p_1,~p_2,~\dots,~p_n~$，定义 f(l,~r)=\begin{cases} (r-l+1)+f(l,~m_{lr}-1)+f(m_{lr}+1,~r) &\text{$l\leq r$} \\ 0 &\text{$l>r$} \end{cases}其中$~m_{lr}~$表示$~p_l,~\dots,~p_r~$中最大值的角标。一共问$~q~$组$~f(l,~r)~$。数据范围$~1\leq n\leq10^6,~1\leq q\leq10^6~$。 题解定义 fl(l,~r)=(m_{lr}-l)+fl(l,~m_{lr}-1)+fl(m_{lr}+1,~r) \\ fr(l,~r)=(r-m_{lr})+fr(l,~m_{lr}-1)+fr(m_{lr}+1,~r)则有 f(l,~r)=(r-l+1)+fl(l,~r)+fr(l,~r)先计算$~fl(l,~r)~$。令 g(i)=\min\{j\mid p_k\leq p_i,~\forall~k\in[j,~i]\}这一步可以通过单调栈线性处理。此时$~[l,~r]~$中每个点$~i~$作为计算过程中的$~m_{lr}~$时对于$~fl(l,~r)~$的贡献为$~i-\max(l,~g(i))~$。即 fl(l,~r)=\sum_{i=l}^{r}i-\max(l,~g(i))在固定$~r~$的条件下，$~fl(l,~r)~$可以视为关于$~l~$的分段线性函数。将询问离线，然后对右端点$~r~$从小到大扫一遍，每次对当前的分段线性函数增加$~r-\max(l,~g(r))~$。如何维护分段线性函数？考虑分段线性函数中的斜率$~k~$和截距$~b~$。当$~l< g(r)~$时，可视为$~b~$增加$~r-g(r)~$。反之$~b~$增加$~r~$，而$~k~$减少$~1~$。于是需要一个支持区间修改和单点查询的数据结构，用差分树状数组即可。对于$~fr(l,~r)~$的计算，将所有数据翻转后等价于计算$~fl(l,~r)~$，总时间复杂度为$~O((n+q)\log n)~$。不推荐使用递归线段树，大常数加上递归复杂度基本会$~\text{TLE}~$。 代码12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;const int maxn = 1 << 20;int p[maxn], l[maxn], r[maxn], sta[maxn], sta_size, cal[maxn];long long res[maxn], bit1[maxn], bit2[maxn];vector<int> query[maxn];#define lowbit(x) ((x) & -(x))inline void modify(long long bit[], const int& p, const long long& a) { for (int i = p; i < maxn; i += lowbit(i)) bit[i] += a;}inline long long pre_sum(long long bit[], const int& p) { long long ret = 0; for (int i = p; i; i ^= lowbit(i)) ret += bit[i]; return ret;}int main() { ios::sync_with_stdio(false); cin.tie(nullptr); int n, m; cin >> n >> m; for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) cin >> p[i]; for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) cin >> l[i]; for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) cin >> r[i], query[r[i]].push_back(i); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { while (sta_size && p[sta[sta_size]] < p[i]) --sta_size; cal[i] = sta[sta_size] + 1; sta[++sta_size] = i; } for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { modify(bit1, 1, i - cal[i]); modify(bit1, i + 1, -i); modify(bit1, cal[i], cal[i]); modify(bit2, cal[i], 1); modify(bit2, i + 1, -1); for (auto x : query[i]) res[x] += pre_sum(bit1, l[x]) - pre_sum(bit2, l[x]) * l[x]; } reverse(p + 1, p + n + 1); sta_size = 0; for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { while (sta_size && p[sta[sta_size]] < p[i]) --sta_size; cal[i] = sta[sta_size] + 1; sta[++sta_size] = i; query[i].clear(); } for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) { r[i] = n + 1 - r[i]; query[n + 1 - l[i]].push_back(i); } memset(bit1, 0, sizeof (bit1)); memset(bit2, 0, sizeof (bit2)); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { modify(bit1, 1, i - cal[i]); modify(bit1, i + 1, -i); modify(bit1, cal[i], cal[i]); modify(bit2, cal[i], 1); modify(bit2, i + 1, -1); for (auto x : query[i]) res[x] += pre_sum(bit1, r[x]) - pre_sum(bit2, r[x]) * r[x]; } for (int i = 1; i ^ m; ++i) cout << res[i] - l[i] - r[i] + n + 2 << ' '; cout << res[m] - l[m] - r[m] + n + 2 << endl;}

posts.text: Codeforces Round #539 (Div. 2) A. Sasha and His Trip题目大意水题。 题解水题。 代码12345678#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int main() { int n, v; cin >> n >> v; cout << (n > v ? (n - v + 1) * (n - v) / 2 + v - 1 : n - 1) << endl;} B. Sasha and Magnetic Machines题目大意水题。 题解水题。 代码12345678910111213141516#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int main() { int n; cin >> n; vector<int> a(n); for (auto& in : a) cin >> in; sort(a.begin(), a.end()); int cal = 0; for (int i = 2; i <= a.back(); ++i) for (int j = n - 1; j; --j) if (a[j] % i == 0) cal = min(cal, (i - 1) * (a.front() - a[j] / i)); cout << accumulate(a.begin(), a.end(), 0) + cal << endl;} C. Sasha and a Bit of Relax题目大意给定一个长度为$~n~$的序列，问有多少个偶数长度的连续子序列满足前一半的$~\text{xor}~$和等于后一半的$~\text{xor}~$和。数据范围$~2\leq n\leq3\cdot10^5,~0\leq a< 2^{20}~$。 题解条件其实等价于这个区间的$~\text{xor}~$和为$~0~$。注意到数据范围，只需要开一个$~cnt~$数组记录前缀$~\text{xor}~$和，然从前往后扫的过程中更新答案和$~cnt~$即可。时间复杂度为$~O(n)~$，空间复杂度$~O(a)~$。当然用$~\text{map}~$来储存$~cnt~$也可以，这样的时间复杂度为$~O(n\log n)~$，空间复杂度为$~O(n)~$。 代码1234567891011121314151617#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;const int maxn = 3e5 + 5;int a[maxn], cnt[1 << 20][2];int main() { int n; cin >> n; for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) cin >> a[i], ++cnt[a[i] ^= a[i - 1]][i & 1]; long long res = 0; for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { res += cnt[a[i - 1]][i & 1 ^ 1]; --cnt[a[i]][i & 1]; } cout << res << endl;} D. Sasha and One More Name题目大意给定一个回文串，需要切$~k~$刀将其拆成$~k+1~$个连续字串，使得存在一种重新组合是个不同于原串的回文串。输出$~k~$的最小值或不存在。数据范围$~1\leq{\mid s\mid}\leq5000~$。 题解显然如果前$~\frac{\mid s\mid}{2}~$个字符一样，则$~k~$不存在。否则存在一个前缀和后缀，将它们交换后可以得到一个新的回文串，于是$~1\leq k\leq2~$。暴力枚举判断即可，时间复杂度为$~O(n^2)~$。但是这题可以进一步优化，如果$~k=1~$，由对称性，不妨设在切在前半段，则所切的那一刀必然得到一个偶数长度的回文前缀的前一半，且剩下的后缀也是回文串（或空串）。运用$~\text{Manacher}~$算法可以在线性时间内处理出每个中心所对应的最长回文串。那怎么判断这样的做法得到的新串是否和原串不一样呢？最朴素的方式是运用$~\text{ex-KMP}~$算法。另一种只需要判断切的这一刀的左边，也就是这个回文前缀的的前一半，是否也是个回文串。如果是，则得到的新串必然和原串一样，这个可以自行证明。不论是否运用$~\text{ex-KMP}~$算法，总时间复杂度均为$~O(n)~$。 代码（$~O(n^2)~$）123456789101112131415161718192021#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;#define all(o) o.begin(), o.end()int main() { string str; cin >> str; string sub = str.substr(0, str.size() >> 1); if (*max_element(all(sub)) == *min_element(all(sub))) return cout << "Impossible" << endl, 0; bool flag = false; while (!sub.empty()) { string tmp = str.substr(sub.size()) + sub; string pmt = tmp; reverse(all(pmt)); if (tmp == pmt && str != tmp) return cout << 1 << endl, 0; sub.pop_back(); } cout << 2 << endl;} 代码（$~O(n)~$）12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;const int maxn = 5e3 + 5;char str[maxn], tmp[maxn << 1];int len[maxn << 1];int manacher(char str[], int n, char tmp[], int len[]) { int l = n + 1 << 1, ret = 1; tmp[0] = '$', tmp[1] = '#'; for (int i = 0; i ^ n; ++i) tmp[i + 1 << 1] = str[i], tmp[i + 1 << 1 ^ 1] = '#'; len[1] = 1; for (int i = 2, mid = 1, right = 1; i ^ l; ++i) if ((i > right) | (i + (len[i] = len[(mid << 1) - i]) > right)) { for (len[mid = i] = 1; tmp[i - len[i]] == tmp[i + len[i]]; ++len[i]); ret = max(ret, len[i] - 1); right = i + len[i] - 1; } return ret;}bool is_palindrome(int left, int right) {return right - left + 2 == len[left + right + 2];}int main() { cin >> str; int n = strlen(str); if (*max_element(str, str + (n >> 1)) == *min_element(str, str + (n >> 1))) return cout << "Impossible" << endl, 0; manacher(str, n, tmp, len); for (int i = 0; i ^ n >> 1; ++i) if (!is_palindrome(0, i) && is_palindrome(0, i << 1 ^ 1) && is_palindrome(i + 1 << 1, n - 1)) return cout << 1 << endl, 0; cout << 2 << endl;} F. Sasha and Interesting Fact from Graph Theory题目大意多少棵节点编号为$~1,~2,~\dots,~n~$，边权范围为$~[1,~m]~$的树，满足连接$~a~$与$~b~$的简单路径的边权之和为$~m~$。数据范围$~2\leq n\leq10^6,~1\leq m\leq10^6~$。 题解有编号生成树计数问题离不开$~\text{Pru2fer}~$序列。一棵大小为$~n~$的无根树的$~\text{Pru2fer}~$序列定义为：每次删去编号最小的叶节点并记录唯一与之相邻的编号，直到还剩$~2~$个点所构成的长度为$~n-2~$的序列。容易证明不同无根树的$~\text{Pru2fer}~$序列一定不同。相反的对于每个长度为$~n-2~$数据范围为$~[1,~n]~$的序列，可以唯一构造出一无根棵树，过程自行思考。于是得到了一个$~n~$阶完全图的无根生成树与$~\text{Pru2fer}~$序列的双射。所以$~n~$阶完全图的无根生成树个数为$~n^{n-2}~$，这也就是$~\text{Cayley}~$公式。显然$~a~$和$~b~$的值并不影响答案。暴力枚举连接$~a~$与$~b~$的简单路径上的点的个数$~x\in[2,~\min(n,~m+1)]~$。先考虑边权部分，对于路径上$~x-1~$条边的边权，这是个很普通的组合数学问题，答案为$~\binom{m-1}{x-1}~$。对于路径外$~n-x~$条边的边权，没有任何限制，答案为$~m^{n-x}~$。对于路径上的点的组合，答案为$~A_{n-2}^{x-2}=\frac{(n-2)!}{(n-x)!}~$。现在问题剩下的部分等价于给定一条$~x~$点的路径的生成树计数问题。不妨设这些点为$~n,~n-1,~\dots,~n-x+1~$。那么这棵树的的$~\text{Pru2fer}~$序列的后$~x-2~$项必为$~n-x+2,~n-x+3,~\dots,~n~$，且倒数第$~x-1~$项必然在$~[n-x+1,~n]~$之中。有了这些限制，合法的$~\text{Pru2fer}~$序列数量为$~x\cdot n^{n-x-1}~$，也就是对应生成树的数量。最终答案公式为 \sum_{x=2}^{\min(n,~m+1)}\frac{x\cdot(n-2)!}{n\cdot(n-x)!}(nm)^{n-x}\binom{m-1}{x-1}如果线性预处理完所有数组，时间复杂度可优化至$~O(n+m)~$。 代码12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;const int mod = 1e9 + 7;const int maxn = 1 << 20;int inv[maxn], fact[maxn], finv[maxn], pownm[maxn];inline int sub(const int& a, const int& b) {return a < b ? a - b + mod : a - b;}inline int add(const int& a, const int& b) {return sub(a, mod - b);}inline int mul(const int& a, const int& b) {return 1LL * a * b % mod;}inline int mul(const int& a, const int& b, const int& c) {return mul(mul(a, b), c);}inline int mul(const int& a, const int& b, const int& c, const int& d) {return mul(mul(a, b), mul(c, d));}inline int bino(const int& a, const int& b) {return mul(fact[a], finv[b], finv[a - b]);}inline void init(int n = maxn) { inv[0] = inv[1] = fact[0] = fact[1] = finv[0] = finv[1] = 1; for (int i = 2; i ^ n; ++i) { inv[i] = mul(inv[mod % i], mod - mod / i); fact[i] = mul(fact[i - 1], i); finv[i] = mul(finv[i - 1], inv[i]); }}int main() { init(); int n, m, a, b; cin >> n >> m >> a >> b; pownm[0] = 1; pownm[1] = mul(n, m); int nm = mul(n, m); for (int i = 1; i ^ maxn; ++i) pownm[i] = mul(pownm[i - 1], nm); int res = 0; for (int x = 2; x <= min(n, m + 1); ++x) res = add(res, mul(mul(pownm[n - x], x, inv[n], bino(m - 1, x - 2)), fact[n - 2], finv[n - x])); cout << res << endl;}

string pmt = tmp; reverse(all(pmt)); if (tmp == pmt && str != tmp) return cout << 1 << endl, 0; sub.pop_back(); } cout << 2 << endl;} 代码（$~O(n)~$）12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;const int maxn = 5e3 + 5;char str[maxn], tmp[maxn << 1];int len[maxn << 1];int manacher(char str[], int n, char tmp[], int len[]) { int l = n + 1 << 1, ret = 1; tmp[0] = '$', tmp[1] = '#'; for (int i = 0; i ^ n; ++i) tmp[i + 1 << 1] = str[i], tmp[i + 1 << 1 ^ 1] = '#'; len[1] = 1; for (int i = 2, mid = 1, right = 1; i ^ l; ++i) if ((i > right) | (i + (len[i] = len[(mid << 1) - i]) > right)) { for (len[mid = i] = 1; tmp[i - len[i]] == tmp[i + len[i]]; ++len[i]); ret = max(ret, len[i] - 1); right = i + len[i] - 1; } return ret;}bool is_palindrome(int left, int right) {return right - left + 2 == len[left + right + 2];}int main() { cin >> str; int n = strlen(str); if (*max_element(str, str + (n >> 1)) == *min_element(str, str + (n >> 1))) return cout << "Impossible" << endl, 0; manacher(str, n, tmp, len); for (int i = 0; i ^ n >> 1; ++i) if (!is_palindrome(0, i) && is_palindrome(0, i << 1 ^ 1) && is_palindrome(i + 1 << 1, n - 1)) return cout << 1 << endl, 0; cout << 2 << endl;} D. Sasha and Interesting Fact from Graph Theory题目大意多少棵节点编号为$~1,~2,~\dots,~n~$，边权范围为$~[1,~m]~$的树，满足连接$~a~$与$~b~$的简单路径的边权之和为$~m~$。数据范围$~2\leq n\leq10^6,~1\leq m\leq10^6~$。 题解有编号生成树计数问题离不开$~\text{Pru2fer}~$序列。一棵大小为$~n~$的无根树的$~\text{Pru2fer}~$序列定义为：每次删去编号最小的叶节点并记录唯一与之相邻的编号，直到还剩$~2~$个点所构成的长度为$~n-2~$的序列。容易证明不同无根树的$~\text{Pru2fer}~$序列一定不同。相反的对于每个长度为$~n-2~$数据范围为$~[1,~n]~$的序列，可以唯一构造出一无根棵树，过程自行思考。于是得到了一个$~n~$阶完全图的无根生成树与$~\text{Pru2fer}~$序列的双射。所以$~n~$阶完全图的无根生成树个数为$~n^{n-2}~$，这也就是$~\text{Cayley}~$公式。显然$~a~$和$~b~$的值并不影响答案。暴力枚举连接$~a~$与$~b~$的简单路径上的点的个数$~x\in[2,~\min(n,~m+1)]~$。先考虑边权部分，对于路径上$~x-1~$条边的边权，这是个很普通的组合数学问题，答案为$~\binom{m-1}{x-1}~$。对于路径外$~n-x~$条边的边权，没有任何限制，答案为$~m^{n-x}~$。对于路径上的点的组合，答案为$~A_{n-2}^{x-2}=\frac{(n-2)!}{(n-x)!}~$。现在问题剩下的部分等价于给定一条$~x~$点的路径的生成树计数问题。不妨设这些点为$~n,~n-1,~\dots,~n-x+1~$。那么这棵树的的$~\text{Pru2fer}~$序列的后$~x-2~$项必为$~n-x+2,~n-x+3,~\dots,~n~$，且倒数第$~x-1~$项必然在$~[n-x+1,~n]~$之中。有了这些限制，合法的$~\text{Pru2fer}~$序列数量为$~x\cdot n^{n-x-1}~$，也就是对应生成树的数量。最终答案公式为 \sum_{x=2}^{\min(n,~m+1)}\frac{x\cdot(n-2)!}{n\cdot(n-x)!}(nm)^{n-x}\binom{m-1}{x-1}如果线性预处理完所有数组，时间复杂度可优化至$~O(n+m)~$。 代码12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;const int mod = 1e9 + 7;const int maxn = 1 << 20;int inv[maxn], fact[maxn], finv[maxn], pownm[maxn];inline int sub(const int& a, const int& b) {return a < b ? a - b + mod : a - b;}inline int add(const int& a, const int& b) {return sub(a, mod - b);}inline int mul(const int& a, const int& b) {return 1LL * a * b % mod;}inline int mul(const int& a, const int& b, const int& c) {return mul(mul(a, b), c);}inline int mul(const int& a, const int& b, const int& c, const int& d) {return mul(mul(a, b), mul(c, d));}inline int bino(const int& a, const int& b) {return mul(fact[a], finv[b], finv[a - b]);}inline void init(int n = maxn) { inv[0] = inv[1] = fact[0] = fact[1] = finv[0] = finv[1] = 1; for (int i = 2; i ^ n; ++i) { inv[i] = mul(inv[mod % i], mod - mod / i); fact[i] = mul(fact[i - 1], i); finv[i] = mul(finv[i - 1], inv[i]); }}int main() { init(); int n, m, a, b; cin >> n >> m >> a >> b; pownm[0] = 1; pownm[1] = mul(n, m); int nm = mul(n, m); for (int i = 1; i ^ maxn; ++i) pownm[i] = mul(pownm[i - 1], nm); int res = 0; for (int x = 2; x <= min(n, m + 1); ++x) res = add(res, mul(mul(pownm[n - x], x, inv[n], bino(m - 1, x - 2)), fact[n - 2], finv[n - x])); cout << res << endl;}

posts.title: Codeforces Round 533 (Div. 2)
posts.text: Codeforces Round #533 (Div. 2) A. Salem and Sticks题目大意水题。 题解水题。 代码12345678910111213141516#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int main() { int n; cin >> n; vector<int> a(n); for (auto& in : a) cin >> in; int t = 0, cost = 0x7fffffff; for (int i = 1; i <= 100; ++i) { int now = 0; for (auto aa : a) now += max(abs(aa - i) - 1, 0); if (now < cost) t = i, cost = now; } cout << t << ' ' << cost << endl;} B. Zuhair and Strings题目大意水题。 题解水题。 代码123456789101112131415161718#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int main() { int n, k; string str; cin >> n >> k >> str; vector<int> cnt(128, 0), cal(128, 0); if (++cnt[str.front()] == k) ++cal[str.front()], --cnt[str.front()]; for (int i = 1; i ^ n; ++i) { if (str[i] ^ str[i - 1]) cnt[str[i]] = 1; else ++cnt[str[i]]; if (cnt[str[i]] == k) ++cal[str[i]], cnt[str[i]] = 0; } int res = 0; for (int i = 'a'; i <= 'z'; ++i) res = max(res, cal[i]); cout << res << endl;} C. Ayoub and Lost Array题目大意问有多少个长度为$~n~$且取值为$~[l,~r]~$的序列满足总和是$~3~$的倍数。数据范围$~1\leq n\leq2\cdot10^5,~1\leq l\leq r\leq10^9~$。 题解动态规划。递推出到每一位上满足总和模$~3~$的余数为$~0,~1,~2~$的序列分别由多少个。这个过程可以用矩阵快速幂优化，总时间复杂度为$~O(\log n)~$。 代码12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;const int mod = 1e9 + 7;inline void mul(int C[][3], int A[][3], int B[][3]) { for (int i = 0; i ^ 3; ++i) for (int j = 0; j ^ 3; ++j) { C[i][j] = 0; for (int k = 0; k ^ 3; ++k) C[i][j] = add(C[i][j], mul(A[i][k], B[k][j])); }}int main() { init(); int n, l, r; cin >> n >> l >> r; int dp[3]; for (int i = 0; i ^ 3; ++i) dp[i] = (r - i + 3) / 3 - (l - i + 2) / 3; int base[3][3] = {{dp[0], dp[2], dp[1]}, {dp[1], dp[0], dp[2]}, {dp[2], dp[1], dp[0]}}; int mat[3][3] = {0}, tmp[3][3]; for (int i = 0; i ^ 3; ++i) mat[i][i] = 1; while (n) { if (n & 1) { mul(tmp, mat, base); memcpy(mat, tmp, sizeof (tmp)); } mul(tmp, base, base); memcpy(base, tmp, sizeof (tmp)); n >>= 1; } cout << mat[0][0] << endl;} D. Kilani and the Game题目大意给定一个$~n\times m~$的网格图和$~p~$种颜色的初始位置以及扩散速度$~s~$。每回合每种颜色可以按曼哈顿距离扩散至空白处。问最终每种颜色的大小。数据范围$~1\leq m\leq1000,~1\leq m\leq1000,~1\leq p\leq9,~1\leq s\leq10^9~$。 题解裸$~\text{BFS}~$，具体实现见代码。 代码12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;typedef pair<int, int> pii;#define mp make_pair#define ff first#define ss secondint main () { int n, m, p; cin >> n >> m >> p; vector<int> speed(p), res(p, 0); vector<queue<pii>> que(p); for (auto& s : speed) cin >> s; vector<vector<bool>> vis(n, vector<bool>(m, false)); for (int i = 0; i ^ n; ++i) for (int j = 0; j ^ m; ++j) { char ch; cin >> ch; if (ch ^ '.') { vis[i][j] = true; if (ch ^ '#') { ++res[ch - '1']; que[ch - '1'].push(mp(i, j)); } } } vector<pii> v(4); v[0] = mp(-1, 0); v[1] = mp(1, 0); v[2] = mp(0, -1); v[3] = mp(0, 1); bool flag = true; while (flag) { flag = false; for (int i = 0; i ^ p; ++i) for (int j = 0; j ^ speed[i]; ++j) { if (que[i].empty()) break; flag = true; queue<pii> tmp; while (!que[i].empty()) { for (auto d : v) { int x = que[i].front().ff + d.ff; int y = que[i].front().ss + d.ss; if (!~x || !~y || x == n || y == m || vis[x][y]) continue; vis[x][y] = true; ++res[i]; tmp.push(mp(x, y)); } que[i].pop(); } que[i] = tmp; } } for (int i = 0; i ^ p - 1; ++i) cout << res[i] << ' '; cout << res.back() << endl;} E. Helping Hiasat题目大意有$~m~$个字符串，现给出若干个字符串集合，要求选出最多的字符串使得每个集合里至多选一个。数据范围$~1\leq n\leq10^5,~1\leq m\leq40,~1\leq{\mid s\mid}\leq40~$。 题解显然可以通过$~\text{map}~$之类的手段化为一个图上最大独立集的问题。而它的补图是个最大团问题。用$~\text{Bron-Kerbosch}~$算法可以在$~O(3^\frac{m}{3})~$的时间复杂度内解决。总时间复杂度为$~O(n\log\mid s\mid+3^\frac{m}{3})~$。 代码1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;typedef unsigned long long ull;#define count1_64 __builtin_popcountll#define low0_64 __builtin_ctzllconst int maxn = 40;ull adj[maxn];int res;void bk(ull cur, ull allow, ull forbid) { if (!allow) { if (!forbid) res = max(res, count1_64(cur)); return; } ull tmp = allow & ~adj[low0_64(allow | forbid)]; for (int i = 0; i ^ maxn; ++i) if (1ULL << i & tmp) { bk(cur ^ 1ULL << i, allow & adj[i], forbid & adj[i]); allow ^= 1ULL << i; forbid ^= 1ULL << i; }}int main() { int n, m; cin >> n >> m; map<string, int> id; ull now = 0; int id_ = 0; while (n--) { int op; cin >> op; if (op == 1) { for (int i = 0; i ^ maxn; ++i) if (now & 1ULL << i) adj[i] |= now; now = 0; } else { string str; cin >> str; if (id.find(str) == id.end()) id[str] = id_++; now |= 1ULL << id[str]; } } for (int i = 0; i ^ maxn; ++i) { if (now & 1ULL << i) adj[i] |= now; adj[i] ^= (1ULL << m) - 1; } bk(0, (1ULL << maxn) - 1, 0); cout << res << endl;}

A. 机器人题目大意水题。 题解水题。注意特殊情况讨论。 代码12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int main() { int n, r, m, k, s; cin >> n >> r >> m >> k >> s; int left[2] = {n, n}, right[2] = {0}; while (r--) { int x, y; cin >> x >> y; left[y] = min(left[y], x); right[y] = max(right[y], x); } vector<bool> flag(n + 1, false); flag[1] = flag[n] = true; while (m--) { int pos; cin >> pos; flag[pos] = true; } int ll = min(left[0], left[1]), rr = max(right[0], right[1]); int lll = ll, rrr = rr; while (!flag[lll]) --lll; while (!flag[rrr]) ++rrr; int res; if (right[1]) { res = k; if (s < ll) { lll = left[1]; while (!flag[lll]) --lll; res += rrr - min(s, lll); } else if (s > rr) { rrr = right[1]; while (!flag[rrr]) ++rrr; res += max(s, rrr) - lll; } else { res += rrr - lll; } } else { if (s < ll) res = rrr - s; else if (s > rr) res = s - lll; else if (ll == rr) res = 0; else res = rrr - lll; } cout << (res << 1) << endl;} B. 吃豆豆题目大意在$~n	imes m~$的网格图上，对于格子$~(i,~j)~$，在$~T[i][j]~$的整数倍秒时会由糖果在上面。现给定起点和终点，每秒可以选择上下左右或者不动，然后可以取走当前格子上的糖果，如果存在的话。问要获得$~C~$个糖果的最短时间。数据范围$~1\leq n\leq10,~1\leq m\le10,~1\leq T\leq10,~1\leq C\leq10^{18}~$。 题解动态规划，记录$~dp[i][j][k]~$表示第$~0~$秒在$~j~$点，第$~i~$秒在$~k~$点最多能得到多少颗糖果，这里$~j~$和$~k~$的范围是$~[0,~nm)~$。枚举$~i~$到$~\gcd(1,~2,~\dots,~10)=2520~$即可，因为第$~2520x~$秒在$~j~$点$~2520x+i~$秒在$~k~$点最多能得到的糖果数也为$~dp[i][j][k]~$。这里我们可以将$~dp[i]~$看作一个$~nm	imes nm~$的矩阵，将正常的矩阵乘法中的数值乘法变为加法，数值乘法变为取$~\max~$。于是对于从$~0~$秒到第$~2520x~$秒的最多糖果矩阵，即为$~dp[2520]^x~$。由于可以原地不动，所以从$~(xs,~ys)~$到$~(xt,~yt)~$经过$~t~$秒所能得到的最多糖果数是单调递增的。用带余除法分解$~t=2520x+y~$，于是通过倍增可以求出$~x~$，然后二分$~y~$可以算出最小的$~t~$值。总时间复杂度为$~O(12600n^4+n^6\log C)~$。 代码1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768697071727374757677#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;const int STEP = 2520;const int mat_size = 10000 * sizeof (__int128);int T[100];__int128 dp0[100][100], dp1[100][100], dp[STEP + 1][100], mat[64][100][100], now[100][100], tmp[100][100], cal[100];inline void update(__int128& x, const __int128& y) {x < y ? (x = y) : 0;}inline void mul(__int128 C[][100], __int128 A[][100], __int128 B[][100], int size) { for (int i = 0; i ^ size; ++i) for (int j = 0; j ^ size; ++j) { C[i][j] = -1; for (int k = 0; k ^ size; ++k) if (~A[i][k] && ~B[k][j]) update(C[i][j], A[i][k] + B[k][j]); }}inline void mul(__int128 C[], __int128 A[][100], __int128 B[], int size) { for (int i = 0; i ^ size; ++i) { C[i] = -1; for (int j = 0; j ^ size; ++j) if (~A[i][j] && ~B[j]) update(C[i], A[i][j] + B[j]); }}void cout128(__int128 x) { if (x > 9) cout128(x / 10); cout << int(x % 10);}int main() { int n, m; long long C; cin >> n >> m >> C; int size = n * m; for (int i = 0; i ^ size; ++i) cin >> T[i]; int xss, yss, xtt, ytt; cin >> xss >> yss >> xtt >> ytt; int ss = xss * m + yss - m - 1, tt = xtt * m + ytt - m - 1; for (int i = 0; i ^ 100; ++i) for (int j = 0; j ^ 100; ++j) if (i ^ j) dp0[i][j] = -1; for (int step = 1; step <= STEP; ++step) { for (int xs = 0; xs ^ n; ++xs) for (int ys = 0; ys ^ m; ++ys) { int s = xs * m + ys; for (int xt = 0; xt ^ n; ++xt) for (int yt = 0; yt ^ m; ++yt) { int t = xt * m + yt; dp1[s][t] = dp0[s][t]; if (xt) update(dp1[s][t], dp0[s][t - m]); if (yt) update(dp1[s][t], dp0[s][t - 1]); if (xt ^ n - 1) update(dp1[s][t], dp0[s][t + m]); if (yt ^ m - 1) update(dp1[s][t], dp0[s][t + 1]); if (~dp1[s][t]) dp1[s][t] += !(step % T[t]); } dp[step][s] = dp1[s][tt]; } memcpy(dp0, dp1, sizeof (dp0)); } for (int i = 1; i <= STEP; ++i) if (dp[i][ss] >= C) return cout << i << endl, 0; memcpy(mat[0], dp0, mat_size); for (int i = 1; i ^ 64; ++i) mul(mat[i], mat[i - 1], mat[i - 1], size); int up = 63; while (mat[up][ss][tt] >= C) --up; memcpy(now, mat[up], mat_size); __int128 X = 1LL << up; for (int k = up - 1; ~k; --k) { mul(tmp, now, mat[k], size); if (tmp[ss][tt] < C) { X ^= 1LL << k; memcpy(now, tmp, mat_size); } } int l = 0, r = STEP; while (r - l ^ 1) { int mid = l + r >> 1; mul(cal, now, dp[mid], size); if (cal[ss] < C) l = mid; else r = mid; } cout128(STEP * X + r); cout << endl;} C. 拆拆拆数题目大意将$~A~$和$~B~$分别拆成尽量小的$~n~$组，然后组成$~n~$对，使得每对互质。 题解首先猜想$~n\leq 2~$，下面通过奇偶性对于$~\gcd(A,~B)>1~$的情况考虑构造。如果$~2
mid A,~2
mid B~$，则拆成$~(2,~A-2),~(B-2,~2)~$是显然满足题意的。剩下的情况不妨设$~2\mid A~$，则$~(3,~A-3),~(B-2,~2)~$和$~(3,~A-3),~(B-4,~4)~$中必有一组是全部互质的。此时只有$~B=5~$的时候会产生非法情况。此时拆成$~(5,~A-5),~(3,~2)~$即可。 代码1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int main() { int t; cin >> t; while (t--) { long long A, B; cin >> A >> B; if (__gcd(A, B) == 1) { cout << 1 << '
' << A << ' ' << B << '
'; continue; } cout << 2 << '
'; if (A & B & 1) { cout << 2 << ' ' << B - 2 << '
' << A - 2 << ' ' << 2 << '
'; } else if (A & 1) { if (A == 5) cout << 2 << ' ' << B - 5 << '
' << 3 << ' ' << 5 << '
'; else if (A % 3 != 2) cout << 2 << ' ' << B - 3 << '
' << A - 2 << ' ' << 3 << '
'; else cout << 4 << ' ' << B - 3 << '
' << A - 4 << ' ' << 3 << '
'; } else { if (B == 5) cout << A - 5 << ' ' << 2 << '
' << 5 << ' ' << 3 << '
'; else if (B % 3 != 2) cout << A - 3 << ' ' << 2 << '
' << 3 << ' ' << B - 2 << '
'; else cout << A - 3 << ' ' << 4 << '

k; k -= lowbit(k)) now += bit2[k]; } res = min(res, now); } cout << res << endl;} K. 星球大战题目大意给定一个$~n~$个点$~m~$条边的简单连通图，定义两点间的距离为连接连点的简单路径的最小值。现给定邪恶势力的起点位置，需要找到一个正义势力的起点位置，使得势力扩散后最终邪恶势力的数量最少。对于每个点，如果它离邪恶势力的距离严格小于离正义势力的距离，则最终会变为邪恶势力，否则变为正义势力或者保持中立。输出邪恶势力最终数量的最小值。 题解问$~	ext{WSY}~$。 代码#include <bits/stdc++.h>using ul = std::uint32_t;using li = std::int32_t;using ll = std::int64_t;using ull = std::uint64_t;using llf = long double;using lf = double;using vul = std::vector<ul>;vul edges[ul(1e5 + 1)];ul father[ul(1e5 + 1)][18];std::vector<ul> sons[ul(1e5 + 1)];ul n, m;std::queue<ul> queue;bool already[ul(1e5 + 1)];std::vector<ul> special;ul disspecial[202][ul(1e5 + 1)];ul dis1[ul(1e5 + 1)];ul left[ul(1e5 + 1)];ul right[ul(1e5 + 1)];std::vector<std::pair<ul, bool>> paras;ul calcfather(ul x, ul lg){ if (!x) { return 0; } if (~father[x][lg]) { return father[x][lg]; } else { return father[x][lg] = calcfather(calcfather(x, lg - 1), lg - 1); }}ul getfather(ul x, ul step){ for (ul lg = 0; step; step >>= 1, ++lg) { if (step & 1) { x = calcfather(x, lg); } } return x;}ul search(ul x, ul cnt) { left[x] = cnt; for (ul son : sons[x]) { cnt = search(son, cnt + 1); } right[x] = cnt; return cnt;}int main(){ std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false); std::cin.tie(nullptr); std::scanf("%u%u", &n, &m); for (ul i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { for (ul j = 0; j != 18; ++j) { father[i][j] = ~ul(0); } } for (ul i = 0; i != m; ++i) { ul u, v; std::scanf("%u%u", &u, &v); edges[u].push_back(v); edges[v].push_back(u); } queue.push(1); already[1] = true; father[1][0] = 0; while (queue.size()) { ul curr = queue.front(); queue.pop(); for (ul nex : edges[curr]) { if (father[curr][0] == nex) { continue; } if (already[nex]) { special.push_back(curr); special.push_back(nex); continue; } father[nex][0] = curr; sons[curr].push_back(nex); queue.push(nex); already[nex] = true; dis1[nex] = dis1[curr] + 1; } } std::sort(special.begin(), special.end()); special.resize(std::unique(special.begin(), special.end()) - special.begin()); search(1, 1); for (ul i = 0; i != special.size(); ++i) { for (ul j = 1; j <= n; ++j) { disspecial[i][j] = ~ul(0); } queue.push(special[i]); disspecial[i][special[i]] = 0; while (queue.size()) { ul curr = queue.front(); queue.pop(); for (ul nex : edges[curr]) { if (~disspecial[i][nex]) { continue; } disspecial[i][nex] = disspecial[i][curr] + 1; queue.push(nex); } } } ul ans = n; for (ul white = 2; white <= n; ++white) { paras.resize(0); for (ul i = 0; i != special.size(); ++i) { if (dis1[special[i]] < disspecial[i][white]) { continue; } ul temp = getfather(special[i], dis1[special[i]] - disspecial[i][white] >> 1); paras.push_back(std::pair<ul, bool>(left[temp], false)); paras.push_back(std::pair<ul, bool>(right[temp], true)); } ul temp = getfather(white, dis1[white] >> 1); paras.push_back(std::pair<ul, bool>(left[temp], false)); paras.push_back(std::pair<ul, bool>(right[temp], true)); std::sort(paras.begin(), paras.end()); temp = 0; ul st = 0; ul prev = 0; for (const auto& para : paras) { if (!st) { prev = para.first; } if (para.second) { --st; } else { ++st; } if (!st) { temp += para.first - prev + 1; } } ans = std::min(ans, n - temp); } std::cout << ans << std::endl; return 0;}

posts.title: RMQ与LCA与ST表 (TBC)
posts.text: RMQ区间最值查询$~\text{Range Minimun/Maximun Query}~$，简称$~\text{RMQ}~$。 线段树线段树是解决$~\text{RMQ}~$问题最普通的办法，时间复杂度为预处理$~O(n)~$，单次询问$~O(\log n)~$。支持在线。同时也支持$~O(\log n)~$的区间修改的动态$~\text{RMQ}~$问题。下面模板的区间均为左开右闭，角标从$~0~$开始。 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344const int maxn = 1 << 17;int a[maxn], seg[maxn << 1], tag[maxn << 1];#define mid (begin + end >> 1)#define lson (index << 1)#define rson (index << 1 ^ 1)void build(int begin, int end, int index) { if (begin ^ mid) { build(begin, mid, lson); build(mid, end, rson); seg[index] = min(seg[lson], seg[rson]); } else { seg[index] = a[begin]; }}inline void push_down(const int& index) { seg[index] += tag[index]; if (index < maxn)) { tag[lson] += tag[index]; tag[rson] += tag[index]; } tag[index] = 0;}void modify(int begin, int end, int index, int left, int right, int x) { push_down(index); if (begin >= left && end <= right) { tag[index] += x; return; } if (left < mid) modify(begin, mid, lson, left, right, x); if (right > mid) modify(mid, end, rson, left, right, x); seg[index] = min(seg[lson] + tag[lson], seg[rson] + tag[rson]);}int query(int begin, int end, int index, int left, int right) { push_down(index); if (begin >= left && end <= right) return seg[index]; if (begin >= right || end <= left) return 0x3f3f3f3f; return min(query(begin, mid, lson, left, right), query(mid, end, rson, left, right));} ST表如果只有静态查询，那么考虑这样一个数组：记$~st[i][j]~$为$~[i,~i+2^j)~$的最值。那么需要$~O(n\log n)~$的空间。显然$~st[i][0]=a[i]~$。且对于其它项，可以将区间$~[i,~i+2^j)~$二分为$~[i,~i+2^{j-1})~$和$~[i+2^{j-1},~i+2^j)~$，也就是通过$~st[i][j-1]~$和$~st[i+2^{j-1}][j-1]~$来$~O(1)~$地转移。那么对于任意的询问区间$~[l,~r)~$，记$~k=\lfloor\log(r-l)\rfloor~$，均可划分为$~[l,~l+2^k)~$和$~[r-2^k,~r)~$这两个子问题来解决。时间复杂度为预处理$~O(n\log n)~$，单次询问$~O(1)~$。支持在线。下面模板的角标从$~0~$开始。 12345678910111213141516const int pow2 = 17;const int maxn = 1 << pow2;int a[maxn], st[maxn][pow2 + 1], log2_floor[maxn], n;void st_init(int n) { log2_floor[0] = -1; for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) log2_floor[i] = log2_floor[i >> 1] + 1; for (int i = 0; i ^ n; ++i) st[i][0] = a[i]; for (int i = 1; i <= log2_floor[n]; ++i) for (int j = 0; j + (1 << i) ^ n; ++j) st[j][i] = min(st[j][i - 1], st[j + (1 << i - 1)][i - 1]);}inline int rmq(const int& l, const int& r) { int k = log2_floor[r - l]; return min(st[l][k], st[r - (1 << k)][k]);} LCA最近公共祖先$~\text{Lowest Common Ancestors}~$，简称$~\text{LCA}~$。 倍增类似于$~\text{ST}~$表的$~\text{DP}~$思想，记$~pa[i][j]~$为节点$~i~$的第$~2^j~$级祖先。为防止溢出，根节点的父亲依然是根节点。现在$~\text{DFS}~$过程中处理出$~pa[i][0]~$，对于其它项，有$~O(1)~$的转移式 pa[i][j]=pa[pa[i][j-1]][j-1]这里的时间复杂度和空间复杂度均为$~O(\log n)~$。那么可以用类似快速幂的方式，可以在$~O(\log n)~$的时间内查询任意点的任意级祖先。查询$~\text{LCA}~$时，先将较深的点上升到与另一点等高，然后在保持两点不一样的条件下，将两个点上升至$~\text{LCA}~$的两个儿子处。时间复杂度为预处理$~O(n\log n)~$，单次查询$~O(\log n)~$。支持在线。 123456789101112131415161718192021const int pow2 = 17;const int maxn = 1 << pow2;vector<int> adj[maxn];int pa[maxn][pow2], dep[maxn];void dfs(int u = 1, int p = 1, int d) { dep[u] = d; pa[u][0] = p; for (int i = 1; i ^ pow2; ++i) pa[u][i] = pa[pa[u][i - 1]][i - 1]; for (auto v : adj[u]) if (v ^ p) dfs(v, u, d + 1);}int lca(int u, int v) { if (dep[u] > dep[u]) swap(u, v); for (int k = dep[v] - dep[u], i = 0; k; k >>= 1, ++i) if (k & 1) u = pa[u][i]; if (u == v) return u; for (int i = pow2 - 1; ~i; --i) if (pa[u][i] ^ pa[v][i]) { u = pa[u][i]; v = pa[v][i]; } return pa[u][0];} ST表首先引入一个叫欧拉序的概念，在$~\text{DFS}~$序的基础上，将回溯过程中经过的点也加入到序列之中，则构成了欧拉序。容易证明，序列的长度为$~2n-1~$，且一个节点是叶节点当且仅当它只在欧拉序中出现一次。那么对于非叶节点$~u~$，它在欧拉序中出现至少$~2~$次，那么节点$~v~$是$~u~$的后代，当且仅当$~v~$在欧拉序中，被$~2~$个$~u~$包含。于是对于欧拉序上两个点的$~\text{LCA}~$问题，可以等价于这两个节点构成的闭区间的$~\text{LCA}~$问题，且$~\text{LCA}~$必出现在这个闭区间之中。和$~\text{RMQ}~$问题一样，这类问题是保偏序的。所以可以用$~\text{ST}~$表来支持$~O(n\log n)~$的预处理和$~O(1)~$的单次在线查询。 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132const int pow2 = 17;const int maxn = 1 << pow2;vector<int> adj[maxn];int st[maxn << 1][pow2 + 1], dep[maxn], euler[maxn], log2_floor[maxn << 1];int euler_clock;void dfs(int u = 1, int p = 0) { st[++euler_clock][0] = u; euler[u] = euler_clock; for (auto v : adj[u]) if (v ^ p) { dep[v] = dep[u] + 1; dfs(v, u); st[++euler_clock][0] = u; }}inline bool cmp(const int& x, const int& y) {return dep[x] < dep[y];}inline int upper(const int& x, const int& y) {return cmp(x, y) ? x : y;}void lca_init() { log2_floor[0] = -1; for (int i = 1; i <= euler_clock; ++i) log2_floor[i] = log2_floor[i >> 1] + 1; for (int i = 1; i <= log2_floor[euler_clock]; ++i) for (int j = 1; j + (1 << i) ^ euler_clock + 1; ++j) st[j][i] = upper(st[j][i - 1], st[j + (1 << i - 1)][i - 1]);}inline int lca(int u, int v) { if (u == v) return u; u = euler[u]; v = euler[v]; if (u > v) swap(u, v); int temp = log2_floor[++v - u]; return upper(st[u][temp], st[v - (1 << temp)][temp]);}

posts.title: Codeforces Global Round 1 (TBC)
posts.text: Codeforces Global Round 1 A. Parity题目大意问一个$~k~$位$~b~$进制数的奇偶性。 题解水题。 代码1234567891011121314151617#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int main() { int b, k, a; cin >> b >> k; b &= 1; int res = 0; while (--k) { cin >> a; res ^= a & 1 & b; } cin >> a; res ^= a & 1; if (res) cout << "odd" << endl; else cout << "even" << endl;} B. Tape题目大意要求使用$~k~$个区间覆盖$~n~$个点，输出区间长度总和的最小值。 题解水题。贪心。差分序列排序即可。 代码1234567891011121314#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int main() { int n, m, k; cin >> n >> m >> k; vector<int> b(n), d(n, 0); for (auto& in : b) cin >> in; for (int i = 1; i ^ n; ++i) d[i] = b[i] - b[i - 1] - 1; sort(d.begin(), d.end()); int res = b.back() - b.front() + 1; for (int i = n - k + 1; i ^ n; ++i) res -= d[i]; cout << res << endl;} C. Meaningless Operations题目大意定义$~f(a)=\max{\gcd(a\oplus b,~a\odot b)\mid0< b< a}~$其中$~\oplus~$和$~\odot~$分别是位运算中的异或$~\text{xor}~$和与$~\text{and}~$。一共$~q~$次询问，输出对应的$~f(a)~$。数据范围$~1\leq q\leq10^3,~2\leq a\leq2^{25}-1~$。 题解可以发现将$~a~$二进制表示后，如果不全为$~1~$，则$~f(a)~$即为全为$~1~$的数值（取$~b~$为$~a~$的补位）。否则$~f(a)~$为$~a~$的最大非$~a~$因子。具体证明过程可自行考虑。那么只需要预处理所有$~2^n-1~$即可。用$~\text{map}~$储存预处理数值并用$~\text{__builtin}~$优化位运算，总时间复杂度为$~O(\sqrt{a}+q\log a)~$。当然也可以打表后用数组储存答案，时间复杂度可以优化至$~O(q)~$。 代码1234567891011121314151617181920212223#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int main() { map<int, int> res; for (int i = 2; i <= 25; ++i) { int x = (1 << i) - 1; for (int j = 3, k = sqrt(x + 0.1); j <= k; ++j) if (!(x % j)) { res[x] = x / j; break; } if (res.find(x) == res.end()) res[x] = 1; } int q; cin >> q; while (q--) { int a; cin >> a; int x = (1 << 32 - __builtin_clz(a)) - 1; if (x ^ a) cout << x << endl; else cout << res[x] << endl; }} D. Jongmah题目大意麻将模拟，问最多能凑出多少副顺子或者刻子。 题解动态规划。每个数字如果作为顺子计算，那么只有$~3~$种位置供选择。而若某一位置上这个数字作为顺子出现的次数大于$~2~$，那么对于$~3k~$个一样的顺子，可以化为$~3k~$个刻子。那么对于每一个数字，它前$~2~$个数字的状态总数则是$~3\times3=9~$种，每次转移要计算$~3~$次，这样总时间复杂度为$~O(3^3m)~$。可以用滚动数组优化空间。 代码123456789101112131415161718192021#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int main() { int n, m; cin >> n >> m; vector<int> cnt(m, 0); while (n--) { int a; cin >> a; ++cnt[--a]; } int dp[2][3][3] = {0}; for (int i = 0; i ^ m; ++i) { memset(dp[i & 1 ^ 1], 0, 9 * sizeof (int)); for (int j = 0; j ^ 3; ++j) for (int k = 0; k ^ 3; ++k) for (int l = 0; l ^ 3; ++l) if (j + k + l <= cnt[i]) dp[i & 1 ^ 1][k][l] = max(dp[i & 1 ^ 1][k][l], dp[i & 1][j][k] + l + (cnt[i] - j - k - l) / 3); } cout << dp[m & 1][0][0] << endl;} E. Magic Stones题目大意对于一个长度为$~n~$的序列，可以对非端点元素如下操作：将$~c_i~$变为$~c_{i+1}+c_{i-1}-c_i~$。现给定两个序列$~c~$和$~t~$，问$~c~$能否经过若干次操作变成$~t~$。 题解考虑差分序列，不难发现每次操作则是交换差分序列相邻的两个元素。只需要将差分序列排序比较即可。 代码1234567891011121314#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int main() { int n; cin >> n; vector<int> a(n), b(n); for (auto& in : a) cin >> in; for (auto& in : b) cin >> in; for (int i = n - 1; i; --i) a[i] -= a[i - 1], b[i] -= b[i - 1]; sort(a.begin() + 1, a.end()); sort(b.begin() + 1, b.end()); cout << (a == b ? "Yes" : "No") << endl;} F. Nearest Leaf题目大意编号按照$~\text{DFS}~$序给出一棵边权树，两点之间的距离定义为简单路径的权值和。每次询问编号$~[l,~r]~$内与$~v~$最近的叶子的距离。数据范围$~3\leq n\leq500000,~1\leq q\leq500000~$。 题解将问题离线，对于$~v=1~$的询问，叶节点的距离保留，其余距离设为$~\inf~$，这样可以用一棵最值线段树来询问最短距离。由$~\text{DFS}~$序的性质，每个节点的子树的编号均为序列上的一个闭区间，那么在$~\text{DFS}~$的过程中，区间修改，就能对所有的节点进行询问。总时间复杂度为$~O((n+q)\log n)~$。注意需要快读。 代码1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768697071727374757677787980818283848586878889909192#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;const int maxn = 1 << 19;vector<pair<int, long long>> son[maxn];vector<pair<pair<int, int>, int>> ask[maxn];long long dis[maxn], res[maxn], seg[maxn << 1], tag[maxn << 2];bool check[maxn];int n, now, index[maxn];void dfs1(int u) { now = u; for (auto e : son[u]) { dis[e.first] = dis[u] + e.second; dfs1(e.first); } index[u] = now; check[u] = son[u].empty();}#define mid (begin + end >> 1)#define lson (index << 1)#define rson (index << 1 ^ 1)void build(int begin, int end, int index) { if (begin ^ mid) { build(begin, mid, lson); build(mid, end, rson); seg[index] = min(seg[lson], seg[rson]); } else { seg[index] = check[end] ? dis[end] : 0x3f3f3f3f3f3f3f3f; }}inline void push_down(const int& index) { seg[index] += tag[index]; tag[lson] += tag[index]; tag[rson] += tag[index]; tag[index] = 0;}long long query(int begin, int end, int index, int left, int right) { push_down(index); if (begin >= left && end <= right) return seg[index]; if (begin >= right || end <= left) return 0x3f3f3f3f3f3f3f3f; return min(query(begin, mid, lson, left, right), query(mid, end, rson, left, right));}void modify(int begin, int end, int index, int left, int right, long long x) { push_down(index); if (begin >= left && end <= right) { tag[index] += x; return; } if (left < mid) modify(begin, mid, lson, left, right, x); if (right > mid) modify(mid, end, rson, left, right, x); seg[index] = min(seg[lson] + tag[lson], seg[rson] + tag[rson]);}void dfs2(int u) { for (auto q : ask[u]) res[q.second] = query(0, n, 1, q.first.first - 1, q.first.second); for (auto e : son[u]) { tag[1] += e.second; modify(0, n, 1, e.first - 1, index[e.first], -(e.second << 1)); dfs2(e.first); tag[1] -= e.second; modify(0, n, 1, e.first - 1, index[e.first], e.second << 1); }}int main() { ios::sync_with_stdio(false); cin.tie(nullptr); int q; cin >> n >> q; for (int i = 2; i <= n; ++i) { int p; long long w; cin >> p >> w; son[p].push_back(make_pair(i, w)); } dfs1(1); build(0, n, 1); for (int i = 0; i ^ q; ++i) { int v, l, r; cin >> v >> l >> r; ask[v].push_back(make_pair(make_pair(l, r), i)); } dfs2(1); for (int i = 0; i ^ q; ++i) cout << res[i] << '\n';}

posts.title: Educational Codeforces Round 59 (Rated for Div. 2) (TBC)
posts.text: Educational Codeforces Round 59 (Rated for Div. 2) A. Digits Sequence Dividing题目大意水题。 题解水题。 代码12345678910111213141516#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int main() { int q; cin >> q; while (q--) { int n; string str; cin >> n >> str; if (str.size() == 2 && str.front() >= str.back()) cout << "NO" << endl; else cout << "YES" << endl << 2 << endl << str.front() << ' ' << str.substr(1) << endl; }} B. Digital root题目大意对于任意正整数$~x~$，将其十进制表示下的所有位的数字相加得到新的数字$~\bar{x}~$，不断操作下去，最终会得到一个个位数，记为$~S(x)~$。问第$~k~$大的满足$~S=x~$的数是多少。 题解水题。不难发现每次操作均满足$~x=\bar{x}\mod9~$。于是答案即为$~9(k-1)+x~$。 代码123456789101112#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int main() { int n; cin >> n; while (n--) { long long k, x; cin >> k >> x; cout << (k - 1) * 9 + x << endl; }} C. Brutality题目大意给定一个小写字母串和同样长度的数值序列，字符串中每段连续的同字母字串所对应的数值序列中，最多取$~k~$个数，问最大的取值之和。 题解水题。直接模拟，用$~\text{mulitset}~$或者$~\text{priority_queue}~$维护均可。 代码12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int main() { int n, k; cin >> n >> k; vector<long long> a(n); for (auto& in : a) cin >> in; string str; cin >> str; str.push_back('#'); a.push_back(0); ++n; priority_queue<long long> heap; heap.push(a.front()); long long res = 0; int cnt; for (int i = 1; i ^ n; ++i) { if (str[i] ^ str[i - 1]) { cnt = k; while (!heap.empty()) { res += heap.top(); if (!--cnt) break; heap.pop(); } while (!heap.empty()) heap.pop(); } heap.push(a[i]); } cout << res << endl;} D. Compression题目大意给定一个$~n\times n~$的$~01~$矩阵，问$~n~$的最大因子$~x~$，满足把大矩阵划分为$~\frac{n}{x}\times\frac{n}{x}~$个$~x\times x~$的小矩阵之后，所有的小矩阵均只有一个值。 题解水题？直接对每行每列取$~\gcd~$即可。没看标解也看不懂标解。所以这场比赛有$~4~$个签到题？ 代码1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;const int maxn = 5200;bitset<maxn> row[maxn], column[maxn];inline int calc(const bitset<maxn>& bit, const int n) { int last = !bit[0]; int ret = 0, cnt = 0; for (int i = 0; i ^ n; ++i) { if (last ^ bit[i]) { ret = __gcd(ret, cnt); cnt = 0; } ++cnt; last = bit[i]; } return __gcd(ret, cnt);}int main() { ios::sync_with_stdio(false); cin.tie(nullptr); int n; cin >> n; for (int i = 0; i ^ n; ++i) { string str; cin >> str; for (int j = 0; j ^ n >> 2; ++j) { int x = isdigit(str[j]) ? str[j] - '0' : str[j] - 'A' + 10; for (int k = 0; k ^ 4; ++k) if (x & 1 << 3 - k) row[i].flip(j << 2 ^ k); } } for (int i = 0; i ^ n; ++i) for (int j = 0; j ^ n; ++j) if (row[i][j]) column[j].flip(i); int res = 0; for (int i = 0; i ^ n; ++i) res = __gcd(res, __gcd(calc(row[i], n), calc(column[i], n))); cout << res << endl;} G. Vasya and Maximum Profit题目大意给定两序列$~d_1,~d_2,~\dots,~d_n~$和$~c_1,~c_2,~\dots,~c_n~$，其中$~d~$严格单增。并定义 gap(l,~r)=\begin{cases} \max_{l\leq i< r}(d_{i+1}-d_i)^2 &\text{$l< r$} \\ 0 &\text{$l=r$} \end{cases}对于区间$~[l,~r]~$的价值，计算公式为 (r-l+1)a-\sum_{i=l}^{r}c_i-gap(l,~r)问最大价值。 题解首先预处理$~(d_{i+1}-d_i)^2~$数组。考虑每个区间所对应的$~gap~$在该数组中的位置。用单调栈可以线性预处理出$~(d_{i+1}-d_i)^2~$在该数组中，左右边第一个比它大的位置。那么对于取到$~gap(l,~r)=(d_{i+1}-d_i)^2~$的区间$~[l,~r]~$。可以$~O(1)~$地确认区间的左右边界。暴力枚举每个$~(d_{i+1}-d_i)^2~$，接下来就是一个线段树维护区间求和的最大值问题了，在普通区间求和线段树的基础上，每个节点还需要维护包含左端点的最大区间和和包含右端点的最大区间和。总时间复杂度为$~O(n\log n)~$。 代码123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;const int maxn = 3e5 + 5;long long d[maxn], c[maxn], del[maxn];pair<int, int> seg[maxn];struct Node { long long sum, left, right;} tree[maxn << 2];#define mid (begin + end >> 1)#define lson (index << 1)#define rson (index << 1 ^ 1)void build(int begin, int end, int index) { if (begin == end) { if ((tree[index].sum = c[begin]) > 0) tree[index].left = tree[index].right = c[begin]; return; } build(begin, mid, lson); build(mid + 1, end, rson); tree[index].sum = tree[lson].sum + tree[rson].sum; tree[index].left = max(tree[lson].left, tree[lson].sum + tree[rson].left); tree[index].right = max(tree[rson].right, tree[rson].sum + tree[lson].right);}long long query_sum(int left, int right, int begin, int end, int index) { if (left > end || right < begin) return 0; if (left <= begin && right >= end) return tree[index].sum; return query_sum(left, right, begin, mid, lson) + query_sum(left, right, mid + 1, end, rson);}long long query_left(int left, int right, int begin, int end, int index) { if (left > end || right < begin) return 0xc0c0c0c0c0c0c0c0; if (left <= begin && right >= end) return tree[index].left; return max(query_left(left, right, begin, mid, lson), query_sum(left, right, begin, mid, lson) + query_left(left, right, mid + 1, end, rson));}long long query_right(int left, int right, int begin, int end, int index) { if (left > end || right < begin) return 0xc0c0c0c0c0c0c0c0; if (left <= begin && right >= end) return tree[index].right; return max(query_right(left, right, mid + 1, end, rson), query_sum(left, right, mid + 1, end, rson) + query_right(left, right, begin, mid, lson));}int main() { int n; long long a; cin >> n >> a; for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) cin >> d[i] >> c[i], c[i] = a - c[i]; build(1, n, 1); for (int i = 1; i ^ n; ++i) del[i] = (d[i + 1] - d[i]) * (d[i + 1] - d[i]); stack<int> tmp; for (int i = 1; i ^ n; ++i) { while (!tmp.empty() && del[tmp.top()] < del[i]) { seg[tmp.top()].second = i; tmp.pop(); } tmp.push(i); } while (!tmp.empty()) { seg[tmp.top()].second = n; tmp.pop(); } for (int i = n - 1; i; --i) { while (!tmp.empty() && del[tmp.top()] < del[i]) { seg[tmp.top()].first = i + 1; tmp.pop(); } tmp.push(i); } while (!tmp.empty()) { seg[tmp.top()].first = 1; tmp.pop(); } long long res = 0; for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) res = max(res, c[i]); for (int i = 1; i ^ n; ++i) res = max(res, query_right(seg[i].first, i, 1, n, 1) + query_left(i + 1, seg[i].second, 1, n, 1) - del[i]); cout << res << endl;}

posts.title: JOISC 2014 Day3 电压
posts.text: LOJ2881 题目大意给定一个$~N~$个点$~M~$条边的无自环但可能有重边不连通的图，问有多少条边满足：存在一种点的二染色，使得其余其它$~M-1~$条边的端点均被二染色，但该边为单染色。数据范围$~2\leq N\leq10^5,~1\leq M\leq2\times10^5~$。 题解一条边满足题意当且仅当图中的所有奇环均包含该边且所有偶环均不包含该边。考虑$~\text{DFS}~$生成树，记链为以树上某点和它某祖先的简单路劲。那么途中的所有环均由这棵$~\text{DFS}~$树上的一条链和不在树上的一条边组成。这样树上满足题意的边为奇环链的交减去偶环链的并，树外若也有边满足题意当且仅当改图只有一个奇环链。链交和链并可以用两个树上差分解决。在$~\text{DFS}~$过程中点$~u~$的相邻点$~v~$已经遍历过，且不是通过$~u~$的父亲遍历到$~u~$的那条边，那么$~v~$必为$~u~$的祖先或后代。若为祖先，则确定了一个环，通过$~u~$和$~v~$的深度可以确定环的奇偶性。如果是奇环，则在点$~u~$的链交差分数组上加$~1~$，在点$~v~$的链并差分数组上减$~1~$。那么最后在自下往上的遍历过程中展开差分，对于权值等于奇环链数量的点，它连向它父亲的边必在链交之中。同理对链并的差分数组同样操作，判断时对于正权值的点，它连向它父亲的边必在链并之中。这样最后的总复杂度为$~O(N+M)~$。 代码12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;const int maxn = 1e5 + 5;vector<int> adj[maxn];bool vis[maxn], check[maxn], use[maxn], flag;int dep[maxn], even[maxn], odd[maxn], cnt, tot, cal;void dfs1(int u, int p) { vis[u] = true; for (auto v : adj[u]) { if (vis[v]) { if (v == p && !check[u]) { check[u] = true; continue; } if (dep[u] < dep[v]) continue; if ((dep[u] ^ dep[v]) & 1) { ++even[u]; --even[v]; } else { if (flag) exit((cout << 0 << endl, 0)); ++cnt; ++odd[u]; --odd[v]; } } else { ++tot; dep[v] = dep[u] + 1; dfs1(v, u); } }}void dfs2(int u) { use[u] = true; for (auto v : adj[u]) if (!use[v]) { dfs2(v); even[u] += even[v]; odd[u] += odd[v]; } if (even[u]) --tot; else if (odd[u] == cnt) ++cal;}int main() { int n, m; cin >> n >> m; while (m--) { int u, v; cin >> u >> v; adj[u].push_back(v); adj[v].push_back(u); } int res; for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) if (!vis[i]) { cnt = cal = 0; dfs1(i, 0); dfs2(i); if (cnt) { flag = true; res = cal; if (cnt == 1) ++res; } } if (!flag) res = tot; cout << res << endl;}

posts.title: Codeforces Round 536 (Div. 2)
posts.text: Codeforces Round #536 (Div. 2) A. Lunar New Year and Cross Counting题目大意水题。 题解水题。 代码123456789101112131415#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;char mat[1 << 9][1 << 9];int main() { memset(mat, '.', sizeof (mat)); int n; cin >> n; for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) for (int j = 1; j <= n; ++j) cin >> mat[i][j]; int res = 0; for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) for (int j = 1; j <= n; ++j) if (mat[i][j] == 'X' && mat[i - 1][j - 1] == 'X' && mat[i - 1][j + 1] == 'X' && mat[i + 1][j - 1] == 'X' && mat[i + 1][j + 1] == 'X') ++res; cout << res << endl;} B. Lunar New Year and Food Ordering题目大意餐厅有$~n~$种菜，库存为$~a_1,~a_2,~\dots,~a_n~$，价格为$~c_1,~c_2,~\dots,~c_n~$。依次来$~m~$个客人，第$~i~$个人会点$~d_i~$个$~t_i~$菜。一份份上菜，如果库存没有了$~t_i~$菜，则选择库存里最便宜的菜继续一份份上，即使最终无法上满$~d_i~$份也要继续上，上不满则客人不付钱。输出每个客人要付多少钱。数据范围$~1\leq n\leq10^5,~1\leq m\leq10^5~$。 题解对价格排序以后双指针模拟即可。时间复杂度$~O(n\log n+m)~$。 代码1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int main() { int n, m; cin >> n >> m; vector<long long> c(n); vector<int> a(n), p(n); for (auto& in : a) cin >> in; for (auto& in : c) cin >> in; iota(p.begin(), p.end(), 0); sort(p.begin(), p.end(), [&c] (int x, int y) {return c[x] < c[y];}); int index = 0; while (m--) { int t, d; cin >> t >> d; long long res = 0; if (a[--t] < d) { res += c[t] * a[t]; d -= a[t]; a[t] = 0; while (index ^ n && a[p[index]] < d) { res += c[p[index]] * a[p[index]]; d -= a[p[index]]; a[p[index++]] = 0; } if (index ^ n) { res += c[p[index]] * d; a[p[index]] -= d; } else { res = 0; } } else { a[t] -= d; res = c[t] * d; } cout << res << '\n'; }} C. Lunar New Year and Number Division题目大意给定偶数个数字，要求划分为若干组，每组至少$~2~$个。记$~s~$为一组的总和，输出最小的$~\sum s^2~$。 题解贪心。每组$~2~$个共$~\frac{n}{2}~$组。其中最大值和最小值一组，次大值和次小值一组，以此类推。正确性可用$~\text{Jensen}~$不等书证明。 代码12345678910111213#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int main() { int n; cin >> n; vector<long long> a(n); for (auto& in : a) cin >> in; sort(a.begin(), a.end()); long long res = 0; for (int i = 0; i ^ n >> 1; ++i) res += (a[i] + a[n - 1 - i]) * (a[i] + a[n - 1 - i]); cout << res << endl;} D. Lunar New Year and a Wander题目大意给定一个$~n~$个点简单连通通图。从$~1~$开始遍历所有的点，根据每个点第一次经过的顺序，可以得到一个$~1,~2,~\dots,~n~$的全排列。输出字典序最小的全排列。 题解类似$~\text{Dijstra}~$或$~\text{Prim}~$的思想，每次取与当前联通快相邻的编号最小的点即可。 代码123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;const int maxn = 1e5 + 5;vector<int> adj[maxn];bool vis[maxn];int main() { int n, m; cin >> n >> m; while (m--) { int u, v; cin >> u >> v; adj[u].push_back(v); adj[v].push_back(u); } set<int> que; que.insert(1); vector<int> res; while (!que.empty()) { int now = *que.begin(); vis[now] = true; res.push_back(now); que.erase(now); for (auto next : adj[now]) if (!vis[next]) que.insert(next); } cout << res.front(); for (int i = 1; i ^ res.size(); ++i) cout << ' ' << res[i]; cout << endl;} E. Lunar New Year and Red Envelopes题目大意再$~[1,~n]~$时间段内有$~k~$个红包，每个红包的出现时间段为$~[s,~t]~$，大小为$~w~$。且如果抢了它，则在$~[s,~d]~$以内无法再抢红包，其中$~s\leq t\leq d~$。现在$~\text{Bob}~$抢红包的策略是如果当前时刻可以抢则会去抢$~w~$最大的那个，如果有多个则去抢$~d~$最大的那个（这个操作没看懂）。然后$~\text{Alice}~$可以令$~\text{Bob}~$在最多$~m~$个时刻无法抢红包，问$~\text{Bob}~$的最小收益。数据范围$~1\leq n\leq10^5,~1\leq k\leq10^5,~1\leq m\leq200~$。 题解首先处理$~\text{Bob}~$在每个时刻如果能抢红包，他抢的红包所对应的$~w~$和$~d~$是多少。这一步扫描线可以完成，用$~\text{multiset}~$维护当前时刻所有的红包，然后每个红包在$~s~$秒加入$~t+1~$秒移除。接下来就是个动态规划问题，记$~dp[i][j]~$表示$~\text{Alice}~$已经打断了$~i~$次在$~j~$时刻的最小收益，具体转移见代码。其中$~[i]~$维度可以滚动优化，总时间复杂度为$~O((n+k)\log k+mn)~$。 代码123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;const int maxn = 1e5 + 5;vector<pair<pair<long long, int>, bool>> sweep[maxn];pair<long long, int> red[maxn];long long dp0[maxn], dp1[maxn];int main() { int n, m, k; cin >> n >> m >> k; while (k--) { int s, t, d; long long w; cin >> s >> t >> d >> w; sweep[s].push_back(make_pair(make_pair(w, d), true)); sweep[t + 1].push_back(make_pair(make_pair(w, d), false)); } multiset<pair<long long, int>> line; for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { for (auto& now : sweep[i]) { if (now.second) line.insert(now.first); else line.erase(line.find(now.first)); } if (line.empty()) red[i] = make_pair(0, i); else red[i] = *line.rbegin(); } long long res = 0x3f3f3f3f3f3f3f3f; ++m; memset(dp1, 0x3f, sizeof (dp1)); dp1[1] = 0; while (m--) { memcpy(dp0, dp1, sizeof (dp0)); memset(dp1, 0x3f, sizeof (dp1)); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { dp0[red[i].second + 1] = min(dp0[red[i].second + 1], dp0[i] + red[i].first); dp1[i + 1] = min(dp1[i + 1], dp0[i]); } res = min(res, dp0[n + 1]); } cout << res << endl;} F. Lunar New Year and a Recursive Sequence题目大意已知一个序列$~f~$的递推公式是 f_i=\left(\prod_{j=1}^{k}f_{i-j}^{b_j}\right)\mod(p=998244353)现给出$~b_1,~b_2,~\dots,~b_k~$且$~f_1=f_2=\dots=f_{k-1}=1,~f_n=m~$，求$~f_k~$。数据范围$~1\leq k\leq100,~k< n\leq10^9,~1\leq m< p=998244353~$。 题解赤裸裸的线性递推套$~N~$次剩余。在不考虑序列$~f~$的前$~k~$项时，对于任意$~f_i~$，存在唯一的一组$~\beta_i=(b_{i1},~b_{i2},~\dots,~b_{ik})~$满足$~f_i=\prod_{j=1}^{k}f_j^{b_j}\mod p~$。于是得到了一个$~k~$维线性空间内的一个线性序列$~\beta~$。由费马小定理，可以对$~\beta~$每个维度都取模$~p-1~$意义下的值。于是有$~N~$次剩余方程$~f_k^{b_{nk}}=m\mod p~$。用$~\text{BSGS}~$算法可在$~O(\sqrt{p}\log p)~$内解出。线性递推部分用矩阵快速幂即可打到要求，总时间复杂度为$~O(k^3\log n+\sqrt{p}\log p)~$。或者用$~O(k^2\log n)~$的线性递推倍增算法优化，总时间复杂度为$~O(k^2\log n+\sqrt{p}\log p)~$。注意线性递推部分是取模$~p-1~$。倍增算法部分还可以用模非质数的$~\text{NTT}~$优化，总时间复杂度为$~O(k\log k\log n+\sqrt{p}\log p)~$。 代码（$~O(k^3\log n+\sqrt{p}\log p)~$）123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;const int mod = 998244353;const int root = 3;int base[100][100], power[100][100], tmp[100][100];inline int sub(const int& a, const int& b, const int& p = mod) {return a < b ? a - b + p : a - b;}inline int add(const int& a, const int& b, const int& p = mod) {return sub(a, p - b, p);}inline int mul(const int& a, const int& b, const int& p = mod) {return 1LL * a * b % p;}inline int fpow(int a, int n) { int ret = 1; while (n) { if (n & 1) ret = mul(ret, a); a = mul(a, a); n >>= 1; } return ret;}int bsgs(int n, int m) { int sqr = sqrt(mod + 0.1); int inv = fpow(n, mod - 2); map<int, int> baby; for (int i = 0; i ^ sqr; ++i) { baby[m] = i; m = mul(m, inv); } n = fpow(n, sqr); int now = 1; for (int i = 0; i <= sqr + 1; ++i) { auto ite = baby.find(now); if (ite != baby.end()) return i * sqr + ite->second; now = mul(now, n); } return -1;}int get_root(int p) { vector<int> factors; for (int i = 2, x = p - 1; true; ++i) { if (!(x % i)) { factors.push_back(i); while (!(x % i)) x /= i; } if (1LL * i * i > x) { if (x ^ 1) factors.push_back(x); break; } } for (int ret = 1; true; ++ret) { bool flag = true; for (auto f : factors) if (fpow(ret, (p - 1) / f) == 1) { flag = false; break; } if (flag) return ret; } return -1;}int exgcd(int a, int b, long long& x, long long& y) { if (b) { int d = exgcd(b, a % b, y, x); y -= a / b * x; return d; } return a ? (x = 1, y = 0, a) : -1;}int power_mod(int n, int m, int p) { int root = get_root(p); int y = bsgs(root, m); long long s = 0, t = 0; int d = exgcd(n, p - 1, s, t); if (y % d) return -1; if (s < 0) s = s * y / d % (p - 1) * (2 - p) % (p - 1); else s = s * y / d % (p - 1); return fpow(root, s);}void mul(int C[][100], int A[][100], int B[][100], int size) { for (int i = 0; i ^ size; ++i) for (int j = 0; j ^ size; ++j) { C[i][j] = 0; for (int k = 0; k ^ size; ++k) C[i][j] = add(C[i][j], mul(A[i][k], B[k][j], mod - 1), mod - 1); }}int main() { int k, n, m; cin >> k; for (int i = 0; i ^ k; ++i) cin >> base[0][i], power[i][i] = 1; for (int i = 1; i ^ k; ++i) base[i][i - 1] = 1; cin >> n >> m; for (int t = n - k; t; t >>= 1) { if (t & 1) { mul(tmp, power, base, k); memcpy(power, tmp, sizeof (power)); } mul(tmp, base, base, k); memcpy(base, tmp, sizeof (base)); } cout << power_mod(power[0][0], m, mod) << endl;} 代码（$~O(k^2\log n+\sqrt{p}\log p)~$）#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;namespace BM { typedef vector<int> vi; const int mod = 998244352; inline int sub(const int& a, const int& b) {return a < b ? a - b + mod : a - b;} inline int add(const int& a, const int& b) {return sub(a, mod - b);} inline int mul(const int& a, const int& b) {return 1LL * a * b % mod;} vi bm(vi& c, long long n) { int size = c.size(); if (size == 1) { int ret = 1; for (int a = c.front(); n; n >>= 1) { if (n & 1) ret = mul(ret, a); a = mul(a, a); } return vi(1, ret); } vector<vi> base(size << 1, vi(size, 0)), pow(64, vi(size, 0)); base[0][0] = 1; for (int i = 1; i ^ size << 1; ++i) for (int j = 0; j ^ size; ++j) base[i][j] = add(mul(base[i - 1].back(), c[j]), j ? base[i - 1][j - 1] : 0); if (n < (size << 1)) return base[n]; pow[0][1] = 1; for (int i = 1; i ^ 64; ++i) { vi tmp(size << 1, 0); for (int j = 0; j ^ size; ++j) for (int k = 0; k ^ size; ++k) tmp[j + k] = add(tmp[j + k], mul(pow[i - 1][j], pow[i - 1][k])); for (int j = 0; j ^ size << 1; ++j) for (int k = 0; k ^ size; ++k) pow[i][k] = add(pow[i][k], mul(tmp[j], base[j][k])); } int index = 62; while ((1LL << index) > n) --index; vi ret = pow[index]; n ^= 1LL << index; while (n) { while ((1LL << index) > n) --index; n ^= 1LL << index; vi tmp(size << 1, 0); for (int i = 0; i ^ size; ++i) for (int j = 0; j ^ size; ++j) tmp[i + j] = add(tmp[i + j], mul(ret[i], pow[index][j])); fill(ret.begin(), ret.end(), 0); for (int i = 0; i ^ size << 1; ++i) for (int j = 0; j ^ size; ++j) ret[j] = add(ret[j], mul(tmp[i], base[i][j])); } return ret; }}const int mod = 998244353;const int root = 3;int base[100][100], power[100][100], tmp[100][100];inline int sub(const int& a, const int& b, const int& p = mod) {return a < b ? a - b + p : a - b;}inline int add(const int& a, const int& b, const int& p = mod) {return sub(a, p - b, p);}inline int mul(const int& a, const int& b, const int& p = mod) {return 1LL * a * b % p;}inline int fpow(int a, int n) { int ret = 1; while (n) { if (n & 1) ret = mul(ret, a); a = mul(a, a); n >>= 1; } return ret;}int bsgs(int n, int m) { int sqr = sqrt(mod + 0.1); int inv = fpow(n, mod - 2); map<int, int> baby; for (int i = 0; i ^ sqr; ++i) { baby[m] = i; m = mul(m, inv); } n = fpow(n, sqr); int now = 1; for (int i = 0; i <= sqr + 1; ++i) { auto ite = baby.find(now); if (ite != baby.end()) return i * sqr + ite->second; now = mul(now, n); } return -1;}int get_root(int p) { vector<int> factors; for (int i = 2, x = p - 1; true; ++i) { if (!(x % i)) { factors.push_back(i); while (!(x % i)) x /= i; } if (1LL * i * i > x) { if (x ^ 1) factors.push_back(x); break; } } for (int ret = 1; true; ++ret) { bool flag = true; for (auto f : factors) if (fpow(ret, (p - 1) / f) == 1) { flag = false; break; } if (flag) return ret; } return -1;}int exgcd(int a, int b, long long& x, long long& y) { if (b) { int d = exgcd(b, a % b, y, x); y -= a / b * x; return d; } return a ? (x = 1, y = 0, a) : -1;}int power_mod(int n, int m, int p) { int root = get_root(p); int y = bsgs(root, m); long long s = 0, t = 0; int d = exgcd(n, p - 1, s, t); if (y % d) return -1; if (s < 0) s = s * y / d % (p - 1) * (2 - p) % (p - 1); else s = s * y / d % (p - 1); return fpow(root, s);}void mul(int C[][100], int A[][100], int B[][100], int size) { for (int i = 0; i ^ size; ++i) for (int j = 0; j ^ size; ++j) { C[i][j] = 0; for (int k = 0; k ^ size; ++k) C[i][j] = add(C[i][j], mul(A[i][k], B[k][j], mod - 1), mod - 1); }}int main() { int k, n, m; cin >> k; for (int i = 0; i ^ k; ++i) cin >> base[0][i], power[i][i] = 1; vector<int> vec; for (int i = k - 1; ~i; --i) vec.push_back(base[0][i]); for (int i = 1; i ^ k; ++i) base[i][i - 1] = 1; cin >> n >> m; vec = BM::bm(vec, n - 1); cout << power_mod(vec.back(), m, mod) << endl;}

posts.title: Codeforces Round 534 (Div. 2)
posts.text:
Codeforces Round #534 (Div. 2) A. Splitting into digits题目大意水题。 题解水题。 代码12345678910#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int main() { int n; cin >> n; cout << n << endl; while (--n) cout << 1 << ' '; cout << 1 << endl;} B. Game with string题目大意类似祖玛，两人轮流选择两个一样的相邻字符从字符串中消除，不能操作则失败。 题解模拟。一个字符串的可操作次数是固定的且与操作顺序无关。 代码1234567891011121314151617181920#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int main() { string str; cin >> str; vector<char> chs; int cnt = 0; for (auto ch : str) { if (!chs.empty() && chs.back() == ch) { ++cnt; chs.pop_back(); } else { chs.push_back(ch); } } if (cnt & 1) cout << "Yes" << endl; else cout << "No" << endl;} C. Grid game题目大意一个$~4	imes4~$的大正方形内要放入若干$~1	imes2~$和$~2	imes1~$的小长方形，不能重叠，但是如果某行或者某列被占满则改行或者该列被清空。现给出小长方形的出现顺序，输出一种可行的放置方案。 题解前$~2~$排专门放竖的，第$~3~$排专门放横的即可。 代码12345678910111213141516171819#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int main() { string str; cin >> str; int a = 1, b = 1; for (auto ch : str) { if (ch == '0') { cout << 1 << ' ' << a++ << endl; if (a == 5) a = 1; } else { cout << 3 << ' ' << b << endl; if (b == 1) b = 3; else b = 1; } }} D. Game with modulo题目大意交互题。有个未知数$~a~$，每次只能询问一对数$~(x,~y)~$，如果在模$~a~$意义下满足$~x\geq y~$，则返回$~x~$，否则返回$~y~$。在至多$~60~$次查询内确定$~a~$的大小。数据范围$~1\leq a\leq10^9~$。 题解倍增。如果有$~a>x~$，则通过询问$~(x,~2x)~$得到$~a~$与$~2x~$的大小关系。所以在$~30~$次询问内，可以确认$~a=1~$或者$~a\in(2^i,~2^{i+1}],~i\in[0,~30)~$。对于$~a\in(x,~y]~$，运用同样的思想，询问$~(x,~ rac{x+y}{2})~$，可以确认$~a~$与$~ rac{x+y}{2}~$的关系。于是再用至多$~30~$次询问即可得出答案。 代码1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;inline bool game() { string str; cin >> str; return str == "start";}inline bool query(const int& x, const int& y) { cout << "? " << x << ' ' << y << endl; char ch; cin >> ch; return ch == 'y';}inline void solve(const int& res) {cout << "! " << res << endl;}int main() { while (game()) { int now = 1; while (query(now, now << 1)) now <<= 1; if (now == 1) { solve(query(2, 3) ? 2 : 1); continue; } int left = now, right = now << 1; while (right - left ^ 1) { int mid = left + right >> 1; if (query(left, mid)) left = mid; else right = mid; } solve(right); }} E. Johnny Solving题目大意给定一个$~n~$个点的简单连通图，且每个点的度数至少为$~3~$。再给出一个不大于$~n~$的正整数$~k~$。要求输出一条长度不小于$~ rac{n}{k}~$的简单路径或者$~k~$个长度不是$~3~$的倍数的环，且每个环有个代表点，代表点不能再其他环内。 题解考虑$~	ext{DFS}~$生成树。如果有点的深度不小于$~ rac{n}{k}~$，那么可以直接构造出简单路径。否则这棵树必有至少$~k~$个叶节点。考虑每个叶节点，由于每个点的度数至少为$~3~$且根据$~	ext{DFS}~$生成树的性质，这个叶节点必有至少$~2~$条边连向不同的非父亲祖先。这样每个叶节点可以找到$~3~$个环，可以自行证明必存在长度不是$~3~$的倍数的环。此时该叶节点也满足代表元性质，构造完毕。所有过程均为线性，不过我的代码不知道为什么不加剪枝会$~	ext{TLE}~$。 代码1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768697071#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;const int maxn = 1 << 18;vector<int> adj[maxn];bool vis[maxn];int fa[maxn], dep[maxn], n, m, k;vector<vector<int>> cycles;void dfs(int u, int d) { vis[u] = true; if ((dep[u] = d) > (n - 1) / k) { cout << "PATH
" << d << '
' << u; for (int i = fa[u]; i; i = fa[i]) cout << ' ' << i; cout << '
'; exit(0); } bool flag = true; for (auto v : adj[u]) if (!vis[v]) { fa[v] = u; dfs(v, d + 1); flag = false; } while (flag) { int index = 0; if (adj[u][index] == fa[u]) ++index; int x = adj[u][index++]; if (adj[u][index] == fa[u]) ++index; int y = adj[u][index]; vector<int> loop(1, u); while (loop.back() ^ x) loop.push_back(fa[loop.back()]); if (loop.size() % 3) { cycles.push_back(loop); break; } loop = vector<int>(1, u); while (loop.back() ^ y) loop.push_back(fa[loop.back()]); if (loop.size() % 3) { cycles.push_back(loop); break; } loop = vector<int>(1, u); if (dep[x] < dep[y]) swap(x, y); loop.push_back(x); while (loop.back() ^ y) loop.push_back(fa[loop.back()]); cycles.push_back(loop); break; } if (cycles.size() == k) { cout << "CYCLES
"; for (auto& loop : cycles) { cout << loop.size() << '
' << loop.front(); for (int i = 1; i ^ loop.size(); ++i) cout << ' ' << loop[i]; cout << '
'; } exit(0); }}int main() { ios::sync_with_stdio(false); cin.tie(nullptr); cin >> n >> m >> k; while (m--) { int u, v; cin >> u >> v; adj[u].push_back(v); adj[v].push_back(u); } dfs(1, 1);}

posts.title: CodeCraft-19 and Codeforces Round 537 (Div. 2)
posts.text: CodeCraft-19 and Codeforces Round #537 (Div. 2) A. Superhero Transformation题目大意水题。 题解水题。 代码1234567891011121314#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int main() { int check[128] = {0}; check['a'] = check['e'] = check['i'] = check['o'] = check['u'] = 1; string s1, s2; cin >> s1 >> s2; if (s1.size() ^ s2.size()) return cout << "No" << endl, 0; for (int i = 0; i ^ s1.size(); ++i) if (check[s1[i]] ^ check[s2[i]]) return cout << "No" << endl, 0; cout << "Yes" << endl;} B. Average Superhero Gang Power题目大意给顶一个序列，最多可以操作$~k~$次，或者移除一个元素，或者是一个元素加$~1~$，且每个元素至多操作$~m~$次。输出该序列最后平均数的最大值。 题解水题。排序后暴力枚举移除操作的次数即可。 代码1234567891011121314151617#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;const int maxn = 1e5 + 10;long long a[maxn], pre[maxn];int main() { int n, k, m; scanf("%d%d%d", &n, &k, &m); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) scanf("%lld", a + i); sort(a, a + n + 1); for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) pre[i] = pre[i - 1] + a[i]; double res = 0; for (int i = 0; i ^ min(n, m + 1); ++i) res = max(res, 1.0 * (pre[n] - pre[i] + min(1LL * (n - i) * k, 1LL * (m - i))) / (n - i)); printf("%f\n", res);} C. Creative Snap题目大意需要处理一整段长度为$~2^n~$的数轴，数轴上有$~k~$个物品。对于每个区间可以选择二等分后分别处理或者直接处理。处理区间时，如果区间上有物品，则需要花费$~B\cdot n_a\cdot l$，其中$~n_a~$和$~l~$分别是该区间物品数量和长度。否则处理空区间的花费为$~A~$。问最小总花费。数据范围$~1\leq n\leq30,~1\leq k\leq10^5~$。 题解直接根据题意递归处理即可。考虑一棵完整的线段树，它有$~2^{n+1}~$个节点。但是注意到对于空区间的节点，其子树是不需要考虑的。且最后一层只有$~k~$个非空节点，所以所有需要经过的节点是$~O(nk)~$级别的。对于区间内的数量，可以用$~\text{lower_bound}~$或$~\text{upper_bound}~$来计算，总时间复杂度为$~O(nk\log k)~$。当然你想写线段树动态开点也不是不可以。 代码12345678910111213141516171819202122#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;int n, k;long long A, B;vector<int> a;long long solve(int begin, int end) { int size = upper_bound(a.begin(), a.end(), end) - upper_bound(a.begin(), a.end(), begin); if (!size) return A; long long ret = B * size * (end - begin); if (begin + 1 ^ end) ret = min(ret, solve(begin, begin + end >> 1) + solve(begin + end >> 1, end)); return ret;}int main() { cin >> n >> k >> A >> B; a.resize(k); for (auto& in : a) cin >> in; sort(a.begin(), a.end()); cout << solve(0, 1 << n) << endl;} D. Destroy the Colony题目大意给定一个偶数长度的大小写字符串和$~q~$次询问。每次询问输出有多少种字符串的重排列满足所有一样的字母在同侧且$~x~$和$~y~$位置上的字母也在同侧。数据范围$~1\leq n\leq10^5,~1\leq q\leq10^5~$。 题解先考虑存在性，则存在一种字母的二划分使得每个划分下的数量总和均为$~\frac{n}{2}~$。设划分为 \{a_1,~a_2,~\dots,~a_k\}=\{b_1,~b_2,~\dots,~b_s,~c_1,~c_2,~\dots,~c_t\} \\ \sum_{i=1}^{s}b_i=\sum_{i=1}^{t}c_i={\frac{n}{2}}那么这种满足这种划分的重排列数量为 \frac{(\frac{n}{2})!}{\prod_{i=1}^{s}(b_i)!}\cdot\frac{(\frac{n}{2})!}{\prod_{i=1}^{t}(c_i)!}=\frac{((\frac{n}{2})!)^2}{\prod_{i=1}^{k}(a_i)!}那么只需要考虑有多少种合法的划分方案。注意到最多只有$~52~$种不一样的字母，即$~k\leq52~$。那么可以用一个$~O(nk)~$的动态规划来算出对于任意$~0\leq i\leq n~$，有多少种子集的和为$~i~$。最后考虑询问，这相当于把某对$~a_i~$和$~a_j~$合并后计算，共$~\binom{k}{2}~$种组合如果每种情况分别动态规划，预处理的时间复杂度为$~O(nk^3)~$，显然会$~\text{TLE}~$。注意到每次动态规划的元素大部分是相同的，于是可以考虑可持久化动态规划的做法，在基于$~{a_1,~a_2,~\dots,~a_k}~$的基础上删除$~a_i~$和$~a_j~$。这样每种组合的动态规划时间复杂度为$~O(n)~$，总时间复杂度为$~O(nk^2+q)~$。 代码123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657#include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std;const int mod = 1e9 + 7;const int maxn = 1e5 + 5;int inv[maxn], fact[maxn], finv[maxn];inline int sub(const int& a, const int& b) {return a < b ?
